Thank you for stopping in to check out my Indiegogo campaign to support the production, duplication and national promotion of my brand new, fourth CD for kids and families, "Wonderful YOU!"  My name is Vanessa Trien and I have been dedicating my career to writing, performing and teaching music since the nineties, first in New York City and then in Boston.  Coinciding with the birth of my first child, I finally took a leap in 2005 to record and release my first album of family music, entitled "Hot Air Balloon," which included songs I had written over years of music teaching and writing songs with my students. I began presenting family shows with fellow musicians I had met from years of performing acoustic folk.  Audiences quickly grew, crowding in, filling rooms, toy stores and then theaters and outdoor venues to capacity.  Since then I released two more CDs - "Carnival Day" (coinciding with the birth of my second child while also moving into a new house during a Boston blizzard!) and "Bubble Ride" (no births this time!) - winning Parents' Choice Awards for all three, and developing a strong and loyal fan base in the greater Boston area and throughout the Northeast where we perform.
Since 2005, I have balanced being a mom to two wonderful kids along with teaching many weekly parent/child and pre-school music classes and keeping an active performing schedule with my awesome band of musicians, The Jumping Monkeys (Adam Rothberg, Fabio Pirozzolo, Paul Kochanski, Richard Gates).  Because of this rather wacky and sometimes crazy-making life balance, it takes me a while to sit down, write songs and turn them into an album, but with the incredible help of my dear friend and fellow Jumping Monkey, Adam Michael Rothberg, we are finally doing just that!  And, quite honestly, I'm really proud of what it has turned into!
This album, which I am calling "Wonderful YOU," includes 10 original acoustic folk and folk-pop-world songs aimed for young audiences, plus two covers I love (All Together Now by The Beatles, and Willie and the Hand Jive by Johnny Otis), all tied together by an overarching theme of celebrating YOU, along with your community of friends, family and neighbors coming together to play, work, live, and of course, sing and dance. I am joined on the songs by my awesome Jumping Monkeys band members. And to further the theme of celebrating community, I invited some of my favorite musician friends from my own folk and kindie music communities to join us for this album: Alastair Moock, Rani Arbo, Barbara Brousal, Mister G and other fantastic music friends.

Making an album as a celebration of YOU, the listener, and of our relationships with family, friends and community has been on my mind for a long while. Along with my own two kids, I fall in love with every student I teach and every young audience member with whom I speak. They always have fantastic ideas to share, and it’s inspiring to see their personalities already so strong and vibrant. I wanted to make an album honoring each and every one of those kids I’ve been fortunate enough to meet, along with all the kids and families listening to the album.But making an album is EXPENSIVE.  In relation to what I bring in with my teaching and performing income, it is REALLY EXPENSIVE.  REALLY REALLY EXPENSIVE. My passion is to record and perform music for kids and families so I dived in head-first to make this fourth album and am thrilled I have, but I am definitely feeling the burden of the costs, including the recording, mixing and mastering fees, paying musicians, the graphic design, photography, and duplicating of the CD, hefty award application fees, and a three-month national promotion campaign by one of the best publicists for children's music in the country.  I intended to run a crowdunding campaign for my last CD, "Bubble Ride," but at the last minute I chickened out. Perhaps fear of failure. Or fear of success. Or not wanting to burden my friends, family and fans with a request such as this.  I was nearly ready to chicken out this time around too, but with the encouragement of my community, I'm going forward, confident in the incentives I can offer, confident in the product "Wonderful YOU" is becoming, and confident in YOU - my friends, family, fans, and the broader community of people who support quality independent music for families.  Your financial support in this campaign before the October 14 national release of "Wonderful YOU" will be TREMENDOUS for me, helping me cover all the biggest costs now rolling in, including the very beginning of the three-month national publicity campaign.  Whether you are able to contribute a small or large amount, or would like to contribute in other ways such as spreading the word about this campaign to friends, it all will make a giant difference for me. THANK YOU, WONDERFUL YOU!  I hope you'll read on  for more details on how your generous contributions would be used, and what incentives might entice you to contribute!    What We Need & What You Get Ok, $18,000 sounds like a lot of smackeroos and does it really cost that much to put out this album?  The answers is, yes, it's a lot of smackeroos and yes, it costs that much!  I'll break it down a bit here:
Approximately $6,500 for recording, mixing and mastering fees, and payments to musician performing on the album
Over $3,000 to duplicate and ship CDs (ie. make the actual CDs you get in your hands)
Over $1,600 for designing the CD artwork, stickers and other design work related to the CD and promotion.
$1,000 for professional photography
About $7,000 for the national promotional campaign by one of the best publicists for kindie music in the country
Approximately $750 in national award application fees for the CD
So that's almost $20,000 right there, which doesn't include the upcoming expected costs of mailing CDs; long overdue website, banner, baseball cap and T-shirt design, plus the making of video content, all to support the album and the furthering of my musical endeavors and dreams.  Yikes.  I'll certainly work hard to do my part to cover all I can and need to, but having your generous support will be crucial in my efforts to put these songs out in the world, make this album as successful as it can be, and set the stage for me to be able to record again in the very near future rather than working for years to pay off my debts from this project. If I don't reach my entire Indiegogo goal, I will be deeply grateful to use what I do bring in to pay off the costs of recording, mixing, mastering and duplicating the CD while I cover the additional costs.
And guess what, I've got some great PERKS for you!
There's a whole pile of fun incentives to fit any budget, including autographed CDs, "Wonderful YOU" baseball caps, personalized videos of songs you request, thanks on our website and social media, as well as special concerts or private parties for you and your community. I hope you'll check out our list of perks and see what fits best for you!
    The Impact So, what drives me to write songs for kids, then record and perform them?  It's the glove that fits me best in this world. I LOVE what I do. I love teaching early childhood music in the classroom, I love getting on stage with my band and presenting interactive shows that kids and families can actively participate in together. I love writing songs that I think connects with the imaginations, emotions and energy of young listeners. And I'm lucky to be joined by dear musician friends in the Jumping Monkeys as well as special musical guests who lift the songs up to a level of musicianship in our recordings and shows that parents seem to appreciate and really get jazzed about.  
And why should you support this album while so many people seem to be putting out albums for kids these days?  Because I can confidently say that I believe this is a GREAT album with heart and integrity that you and your family will really enjoy. It's a celebration of YOU and your community. It is my personal, particular folk/pop/world take on the world of kindie music.  As this is my FOURTH album for kids and families, I have a successful track record for putting out albums that parents and kids have loved for many years.  I have also won three Parents' Choice Awards for the last three albums, so far so good!  And I feel that of all my CDs, this latest recording is the one that best reflects my current songwriting style and how we sound live as a band. And with such fantastic special musical guests, it really sounds like a musical community of family and friends having fun making music in your living room.   Risks & Challenges This being my very first crowd funding campaign, I'm aware that I may not reach my goal of $18,000.  I will pray to the crowd funding spirits that I do, but if I don't, every dollar you donate will still be fundamental to helping me get through this project without breaking the bank and allowing me to bring this CD project to fruition and presenting it on a national stage.   Other Ways You Can Help If you feel that you just can't contribute right now but you want to help in some way, I'd love to ask you to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign and the upcoming "Wonderful YOU" CD!  There are easy Indiegogo share tools you can click on to forward the campaign to friends. THANK YOU from the very bottom of my heart for all of your support!  Any way you can help is greatly appreciated!
YOU are WONDERFUL!
Many many thanks,
Vanessa

story:
Hi were Wovenhouse media group! About six months ago we decided to take a huge leap in faith and to launch our media agency. The last six months have been a blast! We've have had so many amazing opportunities and adventures as a company. 

 

Today I'm here to talk to you about our next steps until recently we have been limited to doing only on location projects, and although we're grateful for the many opportunities that have been afforded to us we know that without a brick and mortar office and studio the growth of our company is limited.

 

Recently We've been presented the opportunity to open a studio south of Atlanta in downtown Griffin, This space is not only in a prime retail location but it will also act as a home base for our many Artist contractors, a place to meet our business clients,  teach classes, host Community Art events and most importantly  provide us with a state of the art photo and video production studio. 

 

Here's where you come in we're currently looking for Contributors and Investors. We're looking to raise 8500$ with that we will be able to move in , renovate and furnish the space with the equipment we will need.  

 

Our goal is to be moved in by September , if your interested in giving to our next steps or investing and need more info please do not be shy to contact us.

 

We thank you for taking the time to look at our iNDIEGOGO and look forward to bringing you updates.  You guys wont regret in donationg to this cause, We wholeheartly belive that this next step will open a whole new door of possiblities for our wonderful team!  Until then we invite you to visit our website.  www.wovenhousemedia.com

Love you all and God bless!! 

-Wovenhouse team

story:
A little About Me


I love music..and I have been playing music as far back as I can remember. My first guitar was given to me by my Gramps at 5 years old. My mom bought me my first drum set at 13. It was around the same time that I was introduced to MTV and the alternative music of the 90's. There was nothing more I wanted to do than create songs.

As life would have it, music helped a shy kid like me branch out. It gave me the confidence to stand vulnerable before a crowd of people..and it also brought me through some unusual and unexpected turns in life and self-discovery.  

However, I've never had such a deep reservoir of inspiration than that of lately. The songs captured on the first album are all written in the hospital and hotel post donating a kidney. I joke around-with truth- that my left kidney was most likely blocking these songs and needed to be removed. 

I titled it "Northrup Station" after the hotel I stayed at in Portland, Oregon. I recorded it this past Spring in an old 1940's cabin out in the middle of Pozo, California, with producer Nolan Perry behind the dials. Nolan managed to keep the innocence and simplicity intact in this record as we tried to aim on keeping the complexity of this album more lyrically based and have the music be as a mere simple canvas. 

The second album "Gospel" is a little different..in a good way. Naming it "Gospel" may be a risky move and a little confusing to some, but honestly I didn't know what else to call it. The songs on this record are prayers in song form so the producer who is working on this, Preston Martinez said, "Why don't we call this 'Gospel?'" Preston's a very talented producer as well as a rounded and versatile musician. Over the past few months we've had extensive talks about the potential for each song arrangement wise..and what I love about Preston is that he has this 'out of the box' type of mindset when it comes to recording. He's not afraid of trying something new. He's worked alongside many great artists in Nashville, but the cool thing about him is he doesn't put off that air. He is as equally humble as he is confident. 

Each song on both albums have been carefully chosen to be similar to some of my favorite records, the ones that create an experience for the listener. Maybe even mark out a special time in history. My desire is that this will have that effect for you. 


The Trade Off


For each pledge, I have taken careful thought that the rewards fit a fair trade off. If anything, I want you to walk away feeling like you made out like  bandit. I promise you, I've put 110% into these songs. I literally traded a kidney for these songs. ;) But there's also sweatshirts, tee-shirts, guitar lessons, personal songs I'm adding into the deal... I'll even play in your house and share these songs in your living room. 


Why ?

How many sermons or great teachings can you recall? Now, think about how a song stays etched into your mind. That is why I'm doing this. I believe music has a way of changing the atmosphere and even changing perspective. I've had people who I'd least expect come up to me after a show with tears thanking me for writing these songs. 

It's been six years since recording a studio album and since that time I have had more life experience to add to the fodder of my songwriting and there's nothing more I want then to see this through. Let me not fail to mention that I have this amazing wife and family unit who not only believe in me but they're honest with me. Brutally. They are my main support and reason behind the confidence I have that this will be my best yet.

Risks & Challenges

Truth be told, there is risk involved in this. There is the risk that I won't quite make my goal. I will communicate my every move with you IF that happens and will see to planning this through possibly with a smaller budget. However, I've never been one to give up when faced with a hurdle. This is going to happen people!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help me tremendously by getting the word out on Facebook or word of mouth. There's a link right below where you can copy and share. I can't thank you enough for believing in me and I can't wait to get these albums in your hands!   https://igg.me/at/gospelandkidneyalbum/x/14737580

story:
Ova kampanja je u cijelosti posvećena muzici.
Kampanja je usmjerena na udruživanje s ciljem da se konačno napravi  album  “Kovilje”. Ideja za ovu kampanju je došla od prijatelja i porodice okupljenih oko benda, jer smo željeli konačno čuti 14 novih pjesama na albumu “Kovilje”. Vjerujemo da ima mnogo ljudi kao što smo mi koji osjećaju isto. Nadamo se da se i vi osjećate isto.
 

For English version of the text please see bellow

Bend
Mara i bend su formirani 2010. Mara je pjevač kantautor i svira akustičnu gitaru; Boske je na bubnjevima sa Dariom na klavijaturama i Markom na bas gitari.

Na “Kovilju” su im se pridružili njihovi stari prijatelji, Dino Šukalo i Sandi Kavara, Dino na solo gitari, a Sandi na mandolini.

 

 

Pozadina kampanje
Početkom ove godine, bend je započeo probe koje su trajale nekoliko mjeseci, kako bi se na vrijeme pripremili za termin koji su rezervisali u lokalnom studiju za snimanje. Dobili su nešto sredstava od muzičke fondacije “FMSLU” iz Sarajeva za vrijeme provedeno u studiju i za malu naknadu lokalnom producentu. Napravili su dogovor s njim da će im on pomoći sa snimanjem, kao i da će on potom uraditi miks albuma. Snimanje je prošlo dobro i svi su bili sretni – grubi snimci 14 novih pjesama bili su spremni. Onda je bend čekao da se miks završi…

Prošlo je par mjeseci, ali miksa albuma još nije bilo. Umjesto toga, producent je zatražio da potpišu ugovor kojim bi njemu dali  pravo publishinga. Bend je želio pregovarati o izmjenama u ugovoru, ali je producent odbio, da bi se zatim sasvim povukao iz miksanja albuma. Ovo je pozadina naše kampanje. Kampanjom želimo pretvoriti razočaranje u nešto drugo, nešto kreativno.

Bend je odlučio da je bolje napraviti ovaj ugovor s vama:

Mi ćemo upotrijebiti vaše doprinose da bismo “Kovilje” izdali online do proljeća 2017.

U ovom trenutku vas molimo da pokrijete  troškove miksanja albuma u Mostaru, što iznosi 1250 eura; kao i troškove masteringa u Holandiji s najboljim kvalitetom kojeg možemo postići, što će iznositi oko 600 eura sa popustom. Preostalih 100 eura će biti za pokrivanje troškova i naknada crowdfundinga.

Korak po korak

Ukoliko ova faza prođe dobro i ukoliko bude dovoljan broj ljudi koji osjećaju kao i mi, onda bismo zaista voljeli izdati album i na vinilu. To bi podrazumijevalo pokretanje druge faze crowdfundinga, što smo mi  spremni učiniti ako bude dovoljno interesa. Bend se brine da ovim možda tražimo previše. Stoga se nadamo da je ova kampanja, prilika za nas, ljubitelje muzike, da pošaljemo poruku da smo mi ti koji želimo album, i kažemo da mi želimo drugu fazu crowdfundinga kako bi album izdali na ploči!

Nešto za nešto

Crowdfunding funkcioniše tako što se zamoli ljude koji su zainteresovani da nešto ugleda svjetlo dana da doprinesu sa nešto novca kako bi se to nešto zaista i desilo. Zauzvrat doprinesenom novcu, učesnik dobija dar (“znak zahvalnosti”). Dugo smo razmišljali o svakom “znaku zahvalnosti”, o njegovoj cijeni i to da li bi ga iko želio. Možete pogledati i izabrati ponuđene “znake zahvalnosti” desno na ovoj stranici.  Uplate doprinosa se mogu izvršiti putem PayPala ili kreditnom karticom, tako što izaberete svoj dar i odlučite se za način uplate.

Muzičari širom svijeta koriste crowdfunding sve više i više, jer je to najbolji način da ljudi koji žele čuti muziku nekog benda pomognu da se ta muzika snimi i distribuira. Bend dobije pomoć da bi platio snimanje, a ljudi koji žele čuti njihovu muziku dobiju priliku pomoći  da se to omogući.

Ako imate dodatnih pitanja pogledajte sekciju Pitanja i odgovori koja se nalazi na našoj WEB stranici

Za one od vas koji biste radije pročitali ovu listu darova na engleskom, molimo pogledajte dole u tekstu.

 

This campaign is all about music.
It's about coming together and making the album 'Kovilje' finally happen.

The idea for this campaign came from friends and family around the band, because we wanted to finally hear the 14 new songs on Kovilje. We believe there are many others like us who feel the same way. We hope you feel the same way.

 

The Band
Mara and the band formed in 2010.  Mara is the singer-songwriter and plays acoustic guitar; Boske is on drums with Dario on piano and Marko on bass guitar.

On Kovilje, their old friends Dino Sukalo and Sandi Kavara joined them, with Dino on lead guitar and Sandy on mandolin.

 

 

The Background
At the beginning of the year, they began months of rehearsal to be ready for the time they had booked in a local recording studio; they also received some funding from the music foundation 'FMSLU' to pay for the studio time and a small payment for a local producer.  They made an agreement with him that he would help with the recording and that then he would mix the album.  The recording went well and everyone was happy - the raw recordings of 14 new songs were ready.  Then they waited for the mixing to be completed. ...

A couple of months went by and still there was no mix.  Instead, the producer asked them to sign a contract giving their publishing rights to him.  The band wanted to negotiate changes to the contract, but the producer refused and then pulled out of mixing the album altogether.  This is the background to our campaign.  It's about turning disappointment into something else, something creative.

The band decided it was better to make this contract with you:

we will use your contributions here to release Kovilje online by Spring, 2017.

Right now we are asking only to cover the costs of mixing the album in Mostar, which will be 1,250 Euros; and the cost of mastering it in Holland to the best quality possible, which will be around 600 Euros at a discounted price.  The remaining 100 Euros is to recover the crowdfunding fees and costs.

Step by Step

If this stage goes well and there's enough people who feel like us, then what we'd really like to do is release the album on vinyl.  That would mean a second phase of crowdfunding, but if there's enough interest we are ready to do it.  The band are worried we'd be asking too much.  So this campaign is hopefully a chance for us who love the music to send a message that we want the album and even say we'd like to have a second phase of crowdfunding to get it on vinyl too!

Something for Something

Crowdfunding works by asking people interested in making something happen to contribute a a little money to actually make that something happen.  In return for giving some money, the contributor receives a gift (a 'perk').  Musicians around the world are using crowdfunding more and more, because it's the best way for people who want to hear a band's music help get that music recorded and distributed.  The band gets help to pay for recording and the people who want to hear their music get to help make that possible.

If you have any questions you'd like answered, please see our Questions & Answers page.

Rewards/Perks

We thought a lot about each 'perk', it's price and whether anyone would want it; you can see the perks on offer on the right side of the page.

For those of you who would prefer to read this list in English please see below.

 

Kovilje no more ... no less

A digital copy of the album Kovilje with 14 songs, available for you in the Spring 2017
(once the mixing and mastering is completed ).

Sound & Pictures

Digital Download of the 14-track album Kovilje (available for you Spring, 2017) : : : :
+  Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you;
comprises original photography by Sead Sasivarevic of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes.

Feel Good

We've tried hard to keep the prices as fair as possible, so everyone can enjoy the music - both here in BiH and those of us in other parts of the world.  But if you think that something you've chosen was worth more than we asked, please select this one too.


Sound, Pictures & More

Digital Download of the 14-track Album Kovilje (available in the Spring of 2017)  : : : :
+ Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you; comprises original photography by Sead Sasivarevic of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes : : :
++ 2 new bonus tracks for you to download before the New Year (an acoustic version of 'Jedno', and Mara's interpretation of the tradional New Year song 'Pahuljice padajte').
 

Sound, Pictures, History & More

Digital Download of the 14-track Album Kovilje (Spring of 2017) : : :
+ Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you; comprises original photography by Sead Sasivarevic of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes : :
++ 2 new bonus tracks for you to download before the New Year (an acoustic version of 'Jedno', and Mara's interpretation of the tradional New Year song 'Pahuljice padajte') : : : 
 +++ Digital Download of Mara's third Album 'Vasduh' (2008 Album of the Year in BiH).

Picnic in Kovilje

A picnic in June with the band: an afternoon of coffee, cake and photos amongst the kovilje : : : 
+ Digital Download of the 14-track Album Kovilje (available Spring of 2017) : : :
++ Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you; comprises original photography of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes : : :
+++ 2 Bonus Songs for download before New Years Eve : : :
++++ Digital Download of Mara's third Album 'Vasduh' (2008 Album of the Year in Bosnia & Herzegovina).

YouTube Concert

For those of us who live outside of Bosnia & Herzegovina, or at least a long way from Mostar, this is an exclusive opportunity to join in the music and hear songs from the new album LIVE before its release next year : : :

It will be filmed at Mara's home in Mostar on 15th of January 2017.  A local company has freely offered to supply excellent sound and streaming technology to create the highest quality audio & video experience : : :

++++ everything offered in 'Sound, Pictures, History & More'
story_txt: Ova kampanja je u cijelosti posvećena muzici.Kampanja je usmjerena na udruživanje s ciljem da se konačno napravi  album  “Kovilje”. Ideja za ovu kampanju je došla od prijatelja i porodice okupljenih oko benda, jer smo željeli konačno čuti 14 novih pjesama na albumu “Kovilje”. Vjerujemo da ima mnogo ljudi kao što smo mi koji osjećaju isto. Nadamo se da se i vi osjećate isto. For English version of the text please see bellowBendMara i bend su formirani 2010. Mara je pjevač kantautor i svira akustičnu gitaru; Boske je na bubnjevima sa Dariom na klavijaturama i Markom na bas gitari. Na “Kovilju” su im se pridružili njihovi stari prijatelji, Dino Šukalo i Sandi Kavara, Dino na solo gitari, a Sandi na mandolini.  Pozadina kampanje Početkom ove godine, bend je započeo probe koje su trajale nekoliko mjeseci, kako bi se na vrijeme pripremili za termin koji su rezervisali u lokalnom studiju za snimanje. Dobili su nešto sredstava od muzičke fondacije “FMSLU” iz Sarajeva za vrijeme provedeno u studiju i za malu naknadu lokalnom producentu. Napravili su dogovor s njim da će im on pomoći sa snimanjem, kao i da će on potom uraditi miks albuma. Snimanje je prošlo dobro i svi su bili sretni – grubi snimci 14 novih pjesama bili su spremni. Onda je bend čekao da se miks završi…Prošlo je par mjeseci, ali miksa albuma još nije bilo. Umjesto toga, producent je zatražio da potpišu ugovor kojim bi njemu dali  pravo publishinga. Bend je želio pregovarati o izmjenama u ugovoru, ali je producent odbio, da bi se zatim sasvim povukao iz miksanja albuma. Ovo je pozadina naše kampanje. Kampanjom želimo pretvoriti razočaranje u nešto drugo, nešto kreativno.Bend je odlučio da je bolje napraviti ovaj ugovor s vama:Mi ćemo upotrijebiti vaše doprinose da bismo “Kovilje” izdali online do proljeća 2017.U ovom trenutku vas molimo da pokrijete  troškove miksanja albuma u Mostaru, što iznosi 1250 eura; kao i troškove masteringa u Holandiji s najboljim kvalitetom kojeg možemo postići, što će iznositi oko 600 eura sa popustom. Preostalih 100 eura će biti za pokrivanje troškova i naknada crowdfundinga.Korak po korakUkoliko ova faza prođe dobro i ukoliko bude dovoljan broj ljudi koji osjećaju kao i mi, onda bismo zaista voljeli izdati album i na vinilu. To bi podrazumijevalo pokretanje druge faze crowdfundinga, što smo mi  spremni učiniti ako bude dovoljno interesa. Bend se brine da ovim možda tražimo previše. Stoga se nadamo da je ova kampanja, prilika za nas, ljubitelje muzike, da pošaljemo poruku da smo mi ti koji želimo album, i kažemo da mi želimo drugu fazu crowdfundinga kako bi album izdali na ploči!Nešto za neštoCrowdfunding funkcioniše tako što se zamoli ljude koji su zainteresovani da nešto ugleda svjetlo dana da doprinesu sa nešto novca kako bi se to nešto zaista i desilo. Zauzvrat doprinesenom novcu, učesnik dobija dar (“znak zahvalnosti”). Dugo smo razmišljali o svakom “znaku zahvalnosti”, o njegovoj cijeni i to da li bi ga iko želio. Možete pogledati i izabrati ponuđene “znake zahvalnosti” desno na ovoj stranici.  Uplate doprinosa se mogu izvršiti putem PayPala ili kreditnom karticom, tako što izaberete svoj dar i odlučite se za način uplate.Muzičari širom svijeta koriste crowdfunding sve više i više, jer je to najbolji način da ljudi koji žele čuti muziku nekog benda pomognu da se ta muzika snimi i distribuira. Bend dobije pomoć da bi platio snimanje, a ljudi koji žele čuti njihovu muziku dobiju priliku pomoći  da se to omogući.Ako imate dodatnih pitanja pogledajte sekciju Pitanja i odgovori koja se nalazi na našoj WEB straniciZa one od vas koji biste radije pročitali ovu listu darova na engleskom, molimo pogledajte dole u tekstu.  This campaign is all about music.It's about coming together and making the album 'Kovilje' finally happen.The idea for this campaign came from friends and family around the band, because we wanted to finally hear the 14 new songs on Kovilje. We believe there are many others like us who feel the same way. We hope you feel the same way. The BandMara and the band formed in 2010.  Mara is the singer-songwriter and plays acoustic guitar; Boske is on drums with Dario on piano and Marko on bass guitar.On Kovilje, their old friends Dino Sukalo and Sandi Kavara joined them, with Dino on lead guitar and Sandy on mandolin.   The BackgroundAt the beginning of the year, they began months of rehearsal to be ready for the time they had booked in a local recording studio; they also received some funding from the music foundation 'FMSLU' to pay for the studio time and a small payment for a local producer.  They made an agreement with him that he would help with the recording and that then he would mix the album.  The recording went well and everyone was happy - the raw recordings of 14 new songs were ready.  Then they waited for the mixing to be completed. ...A couple of months went by and still there was no mix.  Instead, the producer asked them to sign a contract giving their publishing rights to him.  The band wanted to negotiate changes to the contract, but the producer refused and then pulled out of mixing the album altogether.  This is the background to our campaign.  It's about turning disappointment into something else, something creative.The band decided it was better to make this contract with you:we will use your contributions here to release Kovilje online by Spring, 2017.Right now we are asking only to cover the costs of mixing the album in Mostar, which will be 1,250 Euros; and the cost of mastering it in Holland to the best quality possible, which will be around 600 Euros at a discounted price.  The remaining 100 Euros is to recover the crowdfunding fees and costs.Step by StepIf this stage goes well and there's enough people who feel like us, then what we'd really like to do is release the album on vinyl.  That would mean a second phase of crowdfunding, but if there's enough interest we are ready to do it.  The band are worried we'd be asking too much.  So this campaign is hopefully a chance for us who love the music to send a message that we want the album and even say we'd like to have a second phase of crowdfunding to get it on vinyl too!Something for SomethingCrowdfunding works by asking people interested in making something happen to contribute a a little money to actually make that something happen.  In return for giving some money, the contributor receives a gift (a 'perk').  Musicians around the world are using crowdfunding more and more, because it's the best way for people who want to hear a band's music help get that music recorded and distributed.  The band gets help to pay for recording and the people who want to hear their music get to help make that possible.If you have any questions you'd like answered, please see our Questions & Answers page.Rewards/PerksWe thought a lot about each 'perk', it's price and whether anyone would want it; you can see the perks on offer on the right side of the page.For those of you who would prefer to read this list in English please see below.  Kovilje no more ... no lessA digital copy of the album Kovilje with 14 songs, available for you in the Spring 2017(once the mixing and mastering is completed ). Sound & PicturesDigital Download of the 14-track album Kovilje (available for you Spring, 2017) : : : :+  Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you;comprises original photography by Sead Sasivarevic of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes.Feel GoodWe've tried hard to keep the prices as fair as possible, so everyone can enjoy the music - both here in BiH and those of us in other parts of the world.  But if you think that something you've chosen was worth more than we asked, please select this one too.Sound, Pictures & MoreDigital Download of the 14-track Album Kovilje (available in the Spring of 2017)  : : : :+ Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you; comprises original photography by Sead Sasivarevic of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes : : :++ 2 new bonus tracks for you to download before the New Year (an acoustic version of 'Jedno', and Mara's interpretation of the tradional New Year song 'Pahuljice padajte'). Sound, Pictures, History & MoreDigital Download of the 14-track Album Kovilje (Spring of 2017) : : :+ Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you; comprises original photography by Sead Sasivarevic of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes : :++ 2 new bonus tracks for you to download before the New Year (an acoustic version of 'Jedno', and Mara's interpretation of the tradional New Year song 'Pahuljice padajte') : : :  +++ Digital Download of Mara's third Album 'Vasduh' (2008 Album of the Year in BiH).Picnic in KoviljeA picnic in June with the band: an afternoon of coffee, cake and photos amongst the kovilje : : : + Digital Download of the 14-track Album Kovilje (available Spring of 2017) : : :++ Kovilje Album Artwork emailed to you; comprises original photography of fields of feather grass within beautiful landscapes : : :+++ 2 Bonus Songs for download before New Years Eve : : :++++ Digital Download of Mara's third Album 'Vasduh' (2008 Album of the Year in Bosnia & Herzegovina).YouTube ConcertFor those of us who live outside of Bosnia & Herzegovina, or at least a long way from Mostar, this is an exclusive opportunity to join in the music and hear songs from the new album LIVE before its release next year : : :It will be filmed at Mara's home in Mostar on 15th of January 2017.  A local company has freely offered to supply excellent sound and streaming technology to create the highest quality audio & video experience : : :++++ everything offered in 'Sound, Pictures, History & More'

story:
Who we are

The Michigan G-Men are the premier all-male a cappella group at the University of Michigan. This year, we are recording a full-length studio album through which we will strive to push the boundaries of a cappella by experimenting with avant-garde arrangements and interpretations of modern day music! 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help! The costs of recording, producing, and mastering a full-length album is a lot for a group to take on alone. We have cutting-edge music to share with you all, and we do not want money to stand between us and the impact this project will have on our listeners. In return, you have access to some awesome perks, as well as enjoying our final product when it is released on Spotify and iTunes at the end of the year! The G-Men appreciate and are eternally grateful for any and every donation we receive. 

The Impact

Releasing an album serves as a means of broadening the scope of our audience to share our musical vision with those who cannot attend our concerts every semester. When we produce our music, live or recorded, we always seek to present our audiences with unfamiliar sounds and effects that highlight our interpretation of emotion and meaning within each piece. This enables us to present listeners with fresh interpretations of contemporary music, and with tools that they can use beyond our shared experience to absorb new music with an open mind. Our work challenges the listener to take a step back, approach the music comprehensively,  and forget predisposition. The feelings we invoke are unique and exclusive to our group's style and sound, and we want to have the opportunity to share that with the world.

story:
Hannah Sanders & Ben Savage

|    Before The Sun    |

New Album Pre-Release News

Hallo folks! We have some exciting news for you…

We have completed the recording and engineering of our first duo album, Before The Sun! This is a MASSIVE record for us...We're so excited for how it sounds, and we can't wait for you to hear it.

We have managed to independently fund the recording, mixing and mastering Before The Sun in Toronto, Canada with the amazing David Travers-Smith who has crafted the material in beautiful and subtle colours - we think it sounds really special. For all those of you who got Charms Against Sorrow, or those of you who have seen Ben and I gig the last couple of years, you know how important authentic sound and warm, open-hearted performance is to us, and we really feel that David captures these elements in this record. We also have some beautiful artwork by photographer Rosie Hardy, and magic design by Chris Collins and all the other elements that go into producing a record. The package is almost ready…

However, we need some further investment to get the album manufactured, and get those fine PR folks to tell the world all about it. It literally costs thousands of pounds to get the CD into the world, so we are hoping you'll be good enough to help by pre-ordering the CD and as you will see there are lots of other fun things you get as rewards for helping us early in the process! We have pre-release signed CDs, lovely branded notebooks for all your poems and musings and shopping lists, lyrics of the original songs, artwork from our photoshoot with Rosie Hardy, and even some home-made wine!

Before The Sun is a collection of 10 folk songs, some old, some new, some borrowed, a little Dylan, a little trad, some sad and some happy/sad. There’s a lot of feeling in this record.

 And it has some great guests joining us! We have the phenomenal Kevin Breit (mandocello, guitar, mandola: Norah Jones, Rosanne Cash), the talents of Jon Thorne (double bass: John Smith, Lamb), Jim Causley (you know Jim - his voice is a deep river), Katriona Gilmore (Gilmore & Roberts, she of the sweet voice and the marvellous mandolin!) Evan Carson on percussion (The Willows, Sam Kelly) and Jade Rhiannon's beautiful soft harmonies (The Willows). Last but not least David Travers-Smith even adds a little crumhorn.

We truly think this is a record ready to make an impact and that you, who have been so generous with your support so far, will really enjoy it!

Making a record is a big and risky business...

We are releasing Before The Sun independently, on our own label, Sungrazing Records, and our distributors make sure it gets to all the finest shops and online outlets. But to ensure that the physical copies get to them, and that people know the whys and wherefores before we hit the road to tour it we need the help of specialist PR folks. And this is our shortfall. Every penny you spend with us now on pre-release CDs and rewards will bring Before The Sun into the light of the world!

And it would also be a HUGE help if you could spread the word - either via your own Facebook/Twitter/Instagram or with the old fashion method using mouth to ear, help us spread the word and get this album finally produced.

Thank you SO much for everything you do to support our journey deeper into the music so dear to us. 

May the sun shine warm upon your face...

Hannah    &     Ben x

story:
~ Le projet 

Je me sens investi d'une mission et c'est pour cette raison que cet
album va inévitablement voir le jour. J'ai déjà mis beaucoup de
temps et d'argent dans ce projet et j'en mettrai encore plus, jusqu’à
ce que tôt ou tard, j'arrive à mes fins. Mais pour bien faire les choses
et pour les faire dans un délai raisonnable, je dois maintenant faire
appel à vous; les gens qui croient en moi, ceux qui aiment mon son,
ma voix, mon univers, et qui ont envie que cet album se fraie un
chemin jusqu'à leurs oreilles.

Chanson: 50 contre 1

Chanson: Ballade pour une fille du plateau

 
 
~ Les fonds

Avec ma campagne de sociofinancement, je cherche à recueillir 10 000$ pour couvrir l'ensemble des frais relatifs à la production d'un album.

Exemples:

  • Les musiciens
  • L'ingénieur de son
  • Le mixage
  • Le “mastering”
  • Le photographe
  • L' infographiste
  • L'impression d'une première série de CD
  • Et plusieurs autres

J'ai choisi une campagne de sociofinancement flexible. Donc, que
j'atteigne ou non mon objectif, tous les fonds amassés seront utilisés
pour la réalisation de cet album. Et si par chance je dépasse mon
objectif, tous les surplus iront à fignoler l'album et/ou à la production
d'un premier vidéo clip.

J'ai vingt ans d’expérience comme musicien et je suis très conscient
des défis que j'aurai à surmonter. Mais je suis confiant qu'avec le
bagage professionnel que j'ai accumulé durant mon long parcours et
entouré de mes nombreux collaborateurs, le résultat final atteindra le
niveau de mes attentes gargantuesques.

 

 

~ Devenez mécène

                                                                                                             

La case Supportez ce projet  située en haut de la liste des contreparties vous permet de faire une contribution du montant de votre choix. Il n'y a pas de montants trop petit, ni trop grand. Par contre en échange de cette contribution il n'y a pas de récompenses, mis à part, mon éternelle gratitude et la satisfaction personnelle d'avoir aidé un artiste à réaliser son projet. 

 

~ Liste des contreparties (récompenses)

Mais si vous êtes intéressé à me donner un petit coup de pouce en échange d'une contrepartie vous n'avez qu'à cliquer sur la ou les contreparties qui vous feraient plaisir et puis faire le don approprié. Il y a des récompenses pour tous les goûts et tous les budgets.

Copie numérique                   

Cette contrepartie inclut: Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel. Notes: Envoi prévu printemps 2017

Copie physique                  

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale. Notes: Envoi prévu, printemps 2017

 Passe V.I.P.                                                      

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une invitation V.I.P. au lancement de l'album et une copie physique de l'album remise en main propre le soir du lancement. Notes: Lancement prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie.

 

                                  

     Producteur                        

Cette contrepartie inclut: Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale, la mention de votre nom dans le livret, en tant que producteur et une invitation au lancement de l'album. Notes: La copie physique pourra être remise en main propre le soir du lancement. Lancement prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie.

 

Chanteur invité

  • Adulte (18 ans et plus)
  • Ados (13 ans et plus)
  • Enfant (12 ans et moins)

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une place pour participer en tant que chanteur à la session d'enregistrement de la chanson ( La vieille ivrogne), un code d’accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale, la mention de votre nom dans le livret de l'album et une invitation au lancement. 

Note: Enregistrement prévu en Estrie, un dimanche de février 2017. Bienvenue aux chanteurs et chanteuses de tous les âges et de tous les niveaux. Les enfants devront-être accompagnés d'un adulte, chanteur ou non chanteur. Lancement de l'album prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie. Confirmation de la date d'enregistrement: 5 janvier 2017.

 

Party de cuisine

                                                                                           

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une prestation solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même d'une durée de deux heures, chez vous, pour vous et une trentaine des vos proches. Dans un rayon de 150 km de Magog. Note: Au delà d'un rayon de 150 km de Magog: Faire un don de 1$ pour chaque tranche de 5 km additionnelle en cliquant sur la case Supportez ce projet situé en haut de la liste des contreparties. Les partys de cuisine auront lieux à partir du 2 mai 2017. Avant ou après avoir fait le don ou les dons appropriés,  contactez-moi pour réserver votre date à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com .

 

Party de cuisine (chez nous)

 

Cette contrepartie inclut: Une prestation solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même d'une durée de deux heures (minimum), Chez moi, dans ma propre cuisine, Note: Le party de cuisine aura lieux le 30 Avril 2017 à Barnston-West. Formule “à la bonne franquette”, apportez votre vin.

Spectacle solo-acoustique                                                                         

 

Cette contrepartie inclut: Un spectacle solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même, d'une durée de deux heures (minimum) pour vous et une soixantaine des vos proches, chez vous ou à l'endroit de votre choix, dans un rayon de 150 km de Magog. Note: Au delà d'un rayon de 150 km de Magog: Faire un don de 1$ pour chaque tranche de 5 km additionnelle en cliquant sur la case   Supportez ce projet  située en haut de la liste des contreparties. Les spectacles-solo-acoustiques auront lieux à partir du 1er Mai 2017. Avant ou après avoir fait le don ou les dons appropriés, contactez-moi pour réserver votre date à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com .

Commandite                                                                                                               

Cette contrepartie inclut:  Le logo et l'URL de votre entreprise dans le livret de l'album. Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livrée à votre adresse postale. Note: Les entreprises qui choisiront cette contrepartie devront me faire parvenir le logo et l'URL de leur entreprise à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com avant le 1er mars 2017.

L'impression d'une première série de CD
Et plusieurs autres
J'ai choisi une campagne de sociofinancement flexible. Donc, quej'atteigne ou non mon objectif, tous les fonds amassés seront utiliséspour la réalisation de cet album. Et si par chance je dépasse monobjectif, tous les surplus iront à fignoler l'album et/ou à la productiond'un premier vidéo clip.J'ai vingt ans d’expérience comme musicien et je suis très conscientdes défis que j'aurai à surmonter. Mais je suis confiant qu'avec lebagage professionnel que j'ai accumulé durant mon long parcours etentouré de mes nombreux collaborateurs, le résultat final atteindra leniveau de mes attentes gargantuesques.  ~ Devenez mécène                                                                                                             La case Supportez ce projet  située en haut de la liste des contreparties vous permet de faire une contribution du montant de votre choix. Il n'y a pas de montants trop petit, ni trop grand. Par contre en échange de cette contribution il n'y a pas de récompenses, mis à part, mon éternelle gratitude et la satisfaction personnelle d'avoir aidé un artiste à réaliser son projet.  ~ Liste des contreparties (récompenses)Mais si vous êtes intéressé à me donner un petit coup de pouce en échange d'une contrepartie vous n'avez qu'à cliquer sur la ou les contreparties qui vous feraient plaisir et puis faire le don approprié. Il y a des récompenses pour tous les goûts et tous les budgets.Copie numérique                   Cette contrepartie inclut: Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel. Notes: Envoi prévu printemps 2017Copie physique                  Cette contrepartie inclut: Une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale. Notes: Envoi prévu, printemps 2017 Passe V.I.P.                                                      Cette contrepartie inclut: Une invitation V.I.P. au lancement de l'album et une copie physique de l'album remise en main propre le soir du lancement. Notes: Lancement prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie.                                        Producteur                        Cette contrepartie inclut: Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale, la mention de votre nom dans le livret, en tant que producteur et une invitation au lancement de l'album. Notes: La copie physique pourra être remise en main propre le soir du lancement. Lancement prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie. Chanteur Cette contrepartie inclut: Une place pour participer en tant que chanteur à la session d'enregistrement de la chanson ( La vieille ivrogne), un code d’accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livré à votre adresse postale, la mention de votre nom dans le livret de l'album et une invitation au lancement. Note: Enregistrement prévu en Estrie, un dimanche de février 2017. Bienvenue aux chanteurs et chanteuses de tous les âges et de tous les niveaux. Les enfants devront-être accompagnés d'un adulte, chanteur ou non chanteur. Lancement de l'album prévu au printemps 2017, en Estrie. Confirmation de la date d'enregistrement: 5 janvier 2017. Party de cuisine                                                                                            Cette contrepartie inclut: Une prestation solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même d'une durée de deux heures, chez vous, pour vous et une trentaine des vos proches. Dans un rayon de 150 km de Magog. Note: Au delà d'un rayon de 150 km de Magog: Faire un don de 1$ pour chaque tranche de 5 km additionnelle en cliquant sur la case Supportez ce projet situé en haut de la liste des contreparties. Les partys de cuisine auront lieux à partir du 2 mai 2017. Avant ou après avoir fait le don ou les dons appropriés,  contactez-moi pour réserver votre date à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com . Party de cuisine (chez nous) Cette contrepartie inclut: Une prestation solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même d'une durée de deux heures (minimum), Chez moi, dans ma propre cuisine, Note: Le party de cuisine aura lieux le 30 Avril 2017 à Barnston-West. Formule “à la bonne franquette”, apportez votre vin.Spectacle solo-acoustique                                                                          Cette contrepartie inclut: Un spectacle solo-acoustique-intime de moi-même, d'une durée de deux heures (minimum) pour vous et une soixantaine des vos proches, chez vous ou à l'endroit de votre choix, dans un rayon de 150 km de Magog. Note: Au delà d'un rayon de 150 km de Magog: Faire un don de 1$ pour chaque tranche de 5 km additionnelle en cliquant sur la case   Supportez ce projet  située en haut de la liste des contreparties. Les spectacles-solo-acoustiques auront lieux à partir du 1er Mai 2017. Avant ou après avoir fait le don ou les dons appropriés, contactez-moi pour réserver votre date à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com .Commandite                                                                                                               Cette contrepartie inclut:  Le logo et l'URL de votre entreprise dans le livret de l'album. Un code d'accès au téléchargement gratuit de la version numérique de l'album envoyé à votre adresse courriel ou une copie physique de l'album livrée à votre adresse postale. Note: Les entreprises qui choisiront cette contrepartie devront me faire parvenir le logo et l'URL de leur entreprise à rejeanturbidemusicien@gmail.com avant le 1er mars 2017.

story:
I'm a 37 year old musician. Multi instrumentalist, composer, sound engineer. Bass player first and foremost, I handle all the instruments as well as the vocals duties.

I want to push my music as far as possible and need YOU to make it happen!

What's in it for you? People helping me in this endeavor will get my music before everyone else. You will get a signed copy of the album in either cd OR vinyl version. You will also get a digital download version of the album to take it everywhere!

Can't contribute? No problem! You can help by spreading the word about Wolven!

story:
My Story!

"This Nashville project has been a long time coming--a dream I have had for as long as I can remember. I have been a worship leader for almost nine years. My heart's passion is to worship Jesus and create an atmosphere for others to seek after Him. He is everything! I don't know where I'd be without Him. I am beyond grateful for the talents He has invested in me.

About six years ago, God started birthing songs in my heart to bring to the Church and He continues to give them to me. Some evenings I love to sit at my piano in the living room and just start playing. It is an amazing thing when God drops a song on me!

This project we will be recording in Nashville will be full of new worship songs! I truly believe that God has called me to bring these songs to the Church as a whole. I love it when the congregation stops paying attention to the band, or anyone around them, and lifts up their voices in unity to focus only on Jesus! I KNOW that God is going to use this music to reach out and change lives!"

Record Label

The music industry has changed drastically over the last five years. Thanks to IndieGoGo, we now have the ability to have our very own!

What I Need

I'm not asking anyone to just give me money. I know that $15,000 sounds like a lot of money. Therefore, I want you to know what the money is going toward.

•The cost of arranging, recording, mixing, and mastering

•Paying musicians to play on the recording

•Someone to design the graphics & artwork for the CD

•The production of the CDs, which includes packaging

Other Ways You Can Help!

Whether you're able to contribute or not, please consider helping me out in these ways:

Pray for me! Pray that I can reach this goal. Pray that all the details come together in some amazing ways. Most importantly, PLEASE pray that God will use these songs in the lives of those who will eventually hear them, whether on the album itself, or learning them in their churches.

Can I ask one more thing?

Share this campaign page with your friends, family, church,anyone who loves music and would be encouraged by these songs. Thank you SO much for taking your time to read this and supporting this ministry. God has great things for our future!

Justin Lynn

story:
Resumen

 

Los colaboradores financian ideas que los apasionan y a la gente en la que confían. Estas son algunas cosas que puedes hacer en esta sección:

 
  •  Música con los 9 circuitos del Requinto individual en el Diapasón de la guitarra paso a paso y el séptimo EBook que explica de Principios de Música, Instrumentos musicales, de canto y de músicos para comprender más su utilización y tener un fácil manejo de los instrumentos musicales y en las seis cuerdas de la guitarra con cualquier dedo de ambas manos para poder aprender a tocarla fácil y así poder usar fácilmente y tocar mejor la música que enseñan y tocan los grandes y famosos Músicos y Guitarristas del Mundo.
  • Preséntate y cuenta tu historia.
  •  Soy Jose manuel ayvar , tengo 40 años, desde hace ya 20 años practico guitarra acústica, investigo por mi cuenta de música, de músicos é instrumentos musicales. Inicio a practicar el Piano y comprendo cómo se tocan sus Tonos Notas en conjunto con sus teclas con lo que conozco de guitarra y comprendo cómo se hacen las Notas en las 59 Teclas del Piano y me regalan un Teclado y con el Teclado me pongo a hacer  videos como ensayar el Teclado a mi manera y conozco como se recorren los dedos de ambas manos en todo el teclado del Piano. Y de esta manera observando y escuchando he ido comprendiendo estudiando por mi propia cuenta y aprendiendo de guitarra, piano, música, instrumentos musicales y de músicos. Conocimientos propios con los que he creado / producido Libros Electrónicos EBooks y Videos en español traducidos al inglés para ofrecer a jóvenes y adultos quienes deseen leer EBooks y conocer de música como también practicarla con el instrumento musical de su agrado con la premisa / fundamento de que para aprender fácilmente a tocar un instrumento musical y tener éxito con el  mismo se necesita conocer de música y su estructura en las cuerdas de la guitarra como un pentagrama principalmente.
  • Describe brevemente tu campaña y explica por qué es importante para ti.
  •  Muchos años hace ya 20 años inicié con mis compañeros de clase a estudiar Guitarra acústica en el aula de Guitarra acústica con el maestro de Guitarra y él nos enseño de como estan formados cada tono Natural Mayor Sonidos que se hacen entre todas las seis cuerdas y en cada Traste en el Diapasón de la Guitarra é igualmente cómo está Formado cada grupo de los siete Tonos Notas de los Circulos y Acordes armónicos en grupos de 3 / 4 / 5 Tonos Individuales Sonidos Naturales Mayores.
  • Expresa la magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores.
  •  

    Pagaré la publicidad que ya estoy haciendo de este mi proyecto ya terminado de realizar para comercializar con el totalmente publicidad que estoy realizando por país en Facebook (con  mis demás páginas realizadas si se necesita) páginas ya iniciadas aún sin poner en marcha totalmente. Estudiar para aprender a  publicarme con el Marketing Video servicio nuevo en YouTube y hacer Video YouTube en Vivo y publicaré mis EBooks y Videos con el nuevo Video en vivo de YouTube.

 

Recuerda, sé breve pero personal. Pregúntate: si alguien dejara de leer aquí, ¿estaría listo para colaborar?

 

Como también lo invertiré tomando el Curso Vitalicio de CEO Daniel Marcos y/ó con Alex Berezowski del proyecto en curso ya  GDMDs Gana Dinero Mientras Duermes y Alex en vivo siguiendo su metolología para darle publicidad mundial por C.P.C. a mí EBook que les presento en los países con mayores búsquedas por las palabras clave más solicitadas uno de ellos en México y llegar hasta Alaska, Canadá, Chile, Bolivia, como también a países de occidente Europa y Asia que son los países donde se encuentran los altos índices del volumen de busquedas y con la demás metodología que emplea daniel como pagos a subscripciones, rentas, compras varias, etc... 

 

 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Presenta más detalles:

 
  •  
  • explica cuánto financiamiento necesitas y a dónde va. Sé transparente y específico, la gente necesita confiar en ti para que quiera financiarte.
  • necesito 500 dolares pero lo que se recaude lo recibire con gusto, el dinero se utilizara para finaciar ebooks y estudiar la musica para aprender mas
  •  
  • Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!
  •  
  • Describe a dónde van los fondos si no logras la meta total.
  •  si no logro la meta los fondos los utilizare para mis estudios de musica
 

 

 

El impacto

 

Explica tu campaña en mayor detalle y cuéntale a la gente la diferencia que hará su contribución:

 
  •  
  • explica por qué tu proyecto es valioso para el colaborador y para el mundo.
  •  
  • Describe tu historial de éxito en proyectos como este (si lo tienes).
  •  
  • Haz que la gente lo sienta real y genera confianza.
  •  
 

 

 

Riesgos y desafíos

 

Las personas valoran la transparencia. Sé abierto y destácate al ofrecer perspectivas sobre los riesgos y obstáculos que puedes enfrentar en el camino hacia lograr tu meta.

 
  •  

    Descripción

    Actualizaciones

    Fondeadores(1)

    Comentarios(0)

    Seleccionar idiomaAlemánFrancésInglésItalianoPortugués

      Con la tecnología de Traductor de Google

    ¿De qué trata el proyecto?

    Proyecto con 18 Productos de EBooks y Videos en español y traducidos al inglés. Productos de un solo pago para descargarse y acceso propio de por vida en internet para aprender a tocar y tocar fácilmente la guitarra con los cinco dedos de ambas manos en cada una de sus seis cuerdas. Con principalmente en este 1er. EBook de Principios de Música con los 9 circuitos del Requinto individual en el Diapasón de la guitarra paso a paso y el séptimo EBook que explica de Principios de Música, Instrumentos musicales, de canto y de músicos para comprender más su utilización y tener un fácil manejo de los instrumentos musicales y en las seis cuerdas de la guitarra con cualquier dedo de ambas manos para poder aprender a tocarla fácil y así poder usar fácilmente y tocar mejor la música que enseñan y tocan los grandes y famosos Músicos y Guitarristas del Mundo.

    El Proyecto se puede accesar desde dos sitios; en el sitio 1: es donde están los Productos cargados / subidos ó uploaded individualmente. El Sitio 2: es donde se presentan los productos en una lista todos los productos creados y cuenta con fotografías, platicas y consejos de la música, piano y diversos conceptos.

     

                                        PRODUCCION

    El primer EBook son principios de música y como tocar paso a paso los recorridos con los nombres de los tonos en los Circuitos del Requinto individual y Grupos de tonos armónicos naturales de la Guitarra. Como están formadas las notas de la Guitarra con cada uno de su Tono natural mayor y paso a paso los 9 Recorridos en circuitos en la Guitarra Requinto individual en todos los Trastes del Diapasón y se conocerán los pasos de cómo tocar las cuerdas de la guitarra con todos los dedos sincronizados de ambas manos con el dedo indicado de ambas manos en cada una de las seis cuerdas EBooks traducidos en inglés y español.

    EBook con más EBooks y Videos de regalos directos a los e-mails subscritos y más EBooks y Videos de cursos para conocer como agilizar sencillamente los dedos de ambas manos, como hacerle a la guitarra un óptimo ajuste al encordar y afinar la Guitarra para su buena y optima utilización y aprender más fácilmente la música, canciones y las músicas que enseñan los famosos, músicos y guitarristas famosos del mundo. 

    Simple libro electrónico EBook estructurado para leer de 28 páginas en Español traducido al inglés de Principios de Música y paso a paso Procedimientos de varios circuitos de Requinto Individual de los Tonos Naturales Mayores y simples Videos fáciles demostración para enseñar y ver cómo se practica y como tocar el Requinto Individual con todos los dedos de ambas manos en el Diapasón de una Guitarra.

    El primer libro electrónico EBook presenta los principios de música y varias partes de un Requinto individual secuencial y varios grupos harmónicos de regalo a los e-mails subcritos del Requinto Individual de los Tonos Harmónicos Naturales Mayores entre todos los nueve 5 Circuitos principales y 4 Adjuntos al Requinto Individual de los Tonos Mayores Naturales que se enseñan en el EBook que son y están en todo el Diapasón interno y externo de la Guitarra.

    How to Music Principles & Guitar Requinto Individual Natural Major Pitched Sounds Tours with all Fingers both Hands | EBook de Principios de Música y del Requinto Individual de los Tonos Mayores Naturales en todo el Diapasón de la Guitarra con todos los dedos de ambas manos

     

    EBook de 28 péginas para niños, niñas, jovenes y mayores de edad para conocer de los Principios de Música y seguir los 9 recorridos Circuitos del Requinto Individual de los Tonos Mayores Naturales en todos los trastes del diapason de la Guitarra para tocarse despues Ritmica y Harmonicamente.

    How to Successful initial Guitar Requinto | Como iniciar a un Requinto individual exitosamente

     

    How to Stringing Tight and Tune a Guitar optimally | Como ajustar; ecordar, ajustar y afinar una guitarra optimamente

     

    How to Play Guitar Strings with each Five fingers both hand | Como tocar las Cuerdas de la Guitarra con todos los de dos de ambas manos

     

    How to Trace fingers on fretboard guitar body strings | Como trazar / desplazar nuestros dedos en las uerdas del Diapasón de la Guitarra

     

    How to trace a Circuit of Requinto Natural Major Tones Pitched Sounds | Como trazar un Circuito del Requinto de los Tonos Mayores Sonidos Naturales

     

    How To Be Musicians Musical Instruments and Music principles for Play Sing and Make Music | Como son los Músicos, los Instrumentos Musicales y Principios de Música para Tocarla Cantar y Hacer Música

     

    Love Poem eBook to Read and Sing! #HeForShe For who Loves to Read for who Loves Make Do Poems and Sing it For She! | EBook Poema de Amor para Leer y Cantar #HeForShe Para quien Ama Leer para quien Ama Hacer y Crear Poemas y Cantarlos para Ella

     

    How to Successful Guitar Requinto | Play Guitar Strings with each 5 fingers | Trace Frets on Fingerboard guitar body strings | Como tocar un Exitoso Requinto Indiviaual / Como tocar las Cuerdas de la Guitarra con los 5 dedos / Como Desplazar nuestros dedos entre las Cuierdas de la Guitarra "OFERTA DE 3 PRODUCTOS POR EL PRECIO DE 2."

     

    How to successful Requinto with a Pick on Guitar Strings | Como tocar un Exitoso Requinto individual con una Púa en las Cuerdas de la Guitarra

     

    How to a successful Play Rhythmic Requinto Guitar Pitched Sounds | Como Tocar Exitosamente Sonidos individuales Rítmicos en la Guitarra

     

    ¿Cómo voy a utilizar el dinero?

    Pagaré la publicidad que ya estoy haciendo de este mi proyecto ya terminado de realizar para comercializar con el totalmente publicidad que estoy realizando por país en Facebook (con  mis demás páginas realizadas si se necesita) páginas ya iniciadas aún sin poner en marcha totalmente. Estudiar para aprender a  publicarme con el Marketing Video servicio nuevo en YouTube y hacer Video YouTube en Vivo y publicaré mis EBooks y Videos con el nuevo Video en vivo de YouTube.

    Como también lo invertiré tomando el Curso Vitalicio de CEO Daniel Marcos y/ó con Alex Berezowski del proyecto en curso ya  GDMDs Gana Dinero Mientras Duermes y Alex en vivo siguiendo su metolología para darle publicidad mundial por C.P.C. a mí EBook que les presento en los países con mayores búsquedas por las palabras clave más solicitadas uno de ellos en México y llegar hasta Alaska, Canadá, Chile, Bolivia, como también a países de occidente Europa y Asia que son los países donde se encuentran los altos índices del volumen de busquedas y con la demás metodología que emplea daniel como pagos a subscripciones, rentas, compras varias, etc... 

    Acerca del creador:

    Soy Josué del Río, tengo 40 años, desde hace ya 20 años practico guitarra acústica, investigo por mi cuenta de música, de músicos é instrumentos musicales. Inicio a practicar el Piano y comprendo cómo se tocan sus Tonos Notas en conjunto con sus teclas con lo que conozco de guitarra y comprendo cómo se hacen las Notas en las 59 Teclas del Piano y me regalan un Teclado y con el Teclado me pongo a hacer  videos como ensayar el Teclado a mi manera y conozco como se recorren los dedos de ambas manos en todo el teclado del Piano. Y de esta manera observando y escuchando he ido comprendiendo estudiando por mi propia cuenta y aprendiendo de guitarra, piano, música, instrumentos musicales y de músicos. Conocimientos propios con los que he creado / producido Libros Electrónicos EBooks y Videos en español traducidos al inglés para ofrecer a jóvenes y adultos quienes deseen leer EBooks y conocer de música como también practicarla con el instrumento musical de su agrado con la premisa / fundamento de que para aprender fácilmente a tocar un instrumento musical y tener éxito con el  mismo se necesita conocer de música y su estructura en las cuerdas de la guitarra como un pentagrama principalmente.

    Muchos años hace ya 20 años inicié con mis compañeros de clase a estudiar Guitarra acústica en el aula de Guitarra acústica con el maestro de Guitarra y él nos enseño de como estan formados cada tono Natural Mayor Sonidos que se hacen entre todas las seis cuerdas y en cada Traste en el Diapasón de la Guitarra é igualmente cómo está Formado cada grupo de los siete Tonos Notas de los Circulos y Acordes armónicos en grupos de 3 / 4 / 5 Tonos Individuales Sonidos Naturales Mayores.

    Estudiándose lo que miramos en clase de nuestro maestro de Guitarra nosotros fuimos tratando de conocer y encontrar fácilmente el Tono Natural Mayor Sonidos en cada cuerda y Traste del Diapasón haciendo un singular Procedimiento como tocarse cada Circuito de los Sonidos Individuales y en grupo con todos los dedos de ambas manos. Por esto fué que estuve hadiendo este Libro Electronico EBook integralmente incorporando los Principios de Música como es creado el Recorrido de los Tonos Naturales Mayores de sus sonidos en los nueve Circuitos del Requinto del Tono Individual Mayor Natural y al mismo tiempo yo fuí conociendo todo del Recorrido en cada una de las seis cuerdas de todos los doce Tono Notas de los Circulos y Acordes y todos los Tonos de los Sonidos Individuales Mayores Naturales del Requinto Individual del Diapasón de la Guitarra.

    Yo estuve creando este Proyecto EBook con más EBooks y Videos con su índice donde en el número 1. TECNICAS PASOS PROCEDIMIENTO PARA ERALIZAR UN RECORRIDO EN LOS TRASTES DEL DIAPASON DE LA GUITARRA Y HACER SONAR LOS TONOS MAYORES NATURALES como una Introducción. 2. Presentación de la estructura del Ensayo en el EBook 3. Practicando / Ensayando nuestros deditos. 4. Trastes que  se pisan en el Diapasón y dedos que accionan las cuerdas de la Guitarra 5. Trastes de la Guitarra 6. REQUINTO en partes con los Nombres de los Tonos Mayores Naturales y las cuerdas que se accionan para emitir el Sonido Natural 7. El Recorrido tambien por partes de los cuatro Circuitos Adjuntos a los cinco Circuitos principales de los Tonos Naturales Mayores y 8. Minimos simples procedimientos Paso a Paso del Recorrido en todos los Trastes del Diapasón conformados por cinco circuitos principales y con sus cuatro Circuitos Adjuntos al lado de los principales cinco Circuitos en todos los Trastes del Diapasón de la Guitarra. Que es esto lo que yo estube plasmando escribiendo éste EBook Haciendolo de cómo es creado el Recorrido de los principios de Música y los Circuitos del Recorrido Individual Sonido de los Tonos Naturales Mayores y con más producción para brindar a la Venta por medio de internet y con EBooks y Videos de regalo directos a los e-mails subscritos en mi sitio del Sisetma de Música y Gutarra.

    ¿Cómo y cuándo se entregarán las recompensas?

    En línea y mediante internet con e-mails a cada aportador ganador y  carga de la lista de cada aportador ganador también; en mi sitio Web en un instante al terminarse de reunir el monto requerido para terminar de realizar el Proyecto.

    ¿Cuáles son los riesgos del proyecto?

    La competencia es un riesgo y obstaculos potenciales a vencer y enfrentar pacíficamente al igual que exitosos y famosos Músicos que enseñan los acompañamientos de su música (como la tocan) en su guitarra que he percibido. Una salida y solución productiva a esto es pronunciar que mí produccion es para obtener más facilidad y para aprender a tocar más fácilmente sus canciones y música famosa acompañadas con su guitarra.

    Como también la realización de más proyectos que tengo ya planeados llevar a cabo ahorita en un total de diez proyectos planeados realizar y más proyectos que se me ofrezcan realizar para otorgar a los usuarios del internet y emerger en el mundo de los negocios electrónicos por el internet.

    No entiendo como valuar el riesgo de lo que veo en mis análisis en Google AdWords en el índice de los Volúmenes de Búsqueda en distintas palabras clave ha ido bajando desde arriba en un índice de 100 hasta ahora por las fechas decembrinas que subirá solo un mínimo ó poco el índice. El índice ha estado yendo a la baja desde un alto índice de 100 hace ya unos 10 / 12 años; aproximadamente desde el año 2004 y desconozco el momento en que subirá de nuevo ó iniciará de nuevo en el índice de 100 ó índice mayor.

  • Comparte lo que hace que te destaques para superar estos obstáculos.
  •  
  • Describe tu plan para solucionar estos desafíos.
  •  
 

 

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:

 
  •  no importa si no pueden donar si pudieran compartir esto se los agradeceria
  • pídele a la gente que difunda tu campaña y que genere eco.
  •  pueden compartir la campaña en facebook,twitter 
  • Recuérdales que usen las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.
  •  porfavor me ayudarian mucho compartiendo este proyecto
 

 

Y eso es todo.
story_txt:
Resumen Los colaboradores financian ideas que los apasionan y a la gente en la que confían. Estas son algunas cosas que puedes hacer en esta sección: 
 Música con los 9 circuitos del Requinto individual en el Diapasón de la guitarra paso a paso y el séptimo EBook que explica de Principios de Música, Instrumentos musicales, de canto y de músicos para comprender más su utilización y tener un fácil manejo de los instrumentos musicales y en las seis cuerdas de la guitarra con cualquier dedo de ambas manos para poder aprender a tocarla fácil y así poder usar fácilmente y tocar mejor la música que enseñan y tocan los grandes y famosos Músicos y Guitarristas del Mundo.
Preséntate y cuenta tu historia.
 Soy Jose manuel ayvar , tengo 40 años, desde hace ya 20 años practico guitarra acústica, investigo por mi cuenta de música, de músicos é instrumentos musicales. Inicio a practicar el Piano y comprendo cómo se tocan sus Tonos Notas en conjunto con sus teclas con lo que conozco de guitarra y comprendo cómo se hacen las Notas en las 59 Teclas del Piano y me regalan un Teclado y con el Teclado me pongo a hacer  videos como ensayar el Teclado a mi manera y conozco como se recorren los dedos de ambas manos en todo el teclado del Piano. Y de esta manera observando y escuchando he ido comprendiendo estudiando por mi propia cuenta y aprendiendo de guitarra, piano, música, instrumentos musicales y de músicos. Conocimientos propios con los que he creado / producido Libros Electrónicos EBooks y Videos en español traducidos al inglés para ofrecer a jóvenes y adultos quienes deseen leer EBooks y conocer de música como también practicarla con el instrumento musical de su agrado con la premisa / fundamento de que para aprender fácilmente a tocar un instrumento musical y tener éxito con el  mismo se necesita conocer de música y su estructura en las cuerdas de la guitarra como un pentagrama principalmente.
Describe brevemente tu campaña y explica por qué es importante para ti.
 Muchos años hace ya 20 años inicié con mis compañeros de clase a estudiar Guitarra acústica en el aula de Guitarra acústica con el maestro de Guitarra y él nos enseño de como estan formados cada tono Natural Mayor Sonidos que se hacen entre todas las seis cuerdas y en cada Traste en el Diapasón de la Guitarra é igualmente cómo está Formado cada grupo de los siete Tonos Notas de los Circulos y Acordes armónicos en grupos de 3 / 4 / 5 Tonos Individuales Sonidos Naturales Mayores.
Expresa la magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores.
 Pagaré la publicidad que ya estoy haciendo de este mi proyecto ya terminado de realizar para comercializar con el totalmente publicidad que estoy realizando por país en Facebook (con  mis demás páginas realizadas si se necesita) páginas ya iniciadas aún sin poner en marcha totalmente. Estudiar para aprender a  publicarme con el Marketing Video servicio nuevo en YouTube y hacer Video YouTube en Vivo y publicaré mis EBooks y Videos con el nuevo Video en vivo de YouTube.

 Recuerda, sé breve pero personal. Pregúntate: si alguien dejara de leer aquí, ¿estaría listo para colaborar? Como también lo invertiré tomando el Curso Vitalicio de CEO Daniel Marcos y/ó con Alex Berezowski del proyecto en curso ya  GDMDs Gana Dinero Mientras Duermes y Alex en vivo siguiendo su metolología para darle publicidad mundial por C.P.C. a mí EBook que les presento en los países con mayores búsquedas por las palabras clave más solicitadas uno de ellos en México y llegar hasta Alaska, Canadá, Chile, Bolivia, como también a países de occidente Europa y Asia que son los países donde se encuentran los altos índices del volumen de busquedas y con la demás metodología que emplea daniel como pagos a subscripciones, rentas, compras varias, etc... 
 
  Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes Presenta más detalles: 
 
explica cuánto financiamiento necesitas y a dónde va. Sé transparente y específico, la gente necesita confiar en ti para que quiera financiarte.
necesito 500 dolares pero lo que se recaude lo recibire con gusto, el dinero se utilizara para finaciar ebooks y estudiar la musica para aprender mas
 
Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!
 
Describe a dónde van los fondos si no logras la meta total.
 si no logro la meta los fondos los utilizare para mis estudios de musica
   El impacto Explica tu campaña en mayor detalle y cuéntale a la gente la diferencia que hará su contribución: 
 
explica por qué tu proyecto es valioso para el colaborador y para el mundo.
 
Describe tu historial de éxito en proyectos como este (si lo tienes).
 
Haz que la gente lo sienta real y genera confianza.
 
   Riesgos y desafíos Las personas valoran la transparencia. Sé abierto y destácate al ofrecer perspectivas sobre los riesgos y obstáculos que puedes enfrentar en el camino hacia lograr tu meta.
