¿De qué trata el proyecto?
Proyecto con 18 Productos de EBooks y Videos en español y traducidos al inglés. Productos de un solo pago para descargarse y acceso propio de por vida en internet para aprender a tocar y tocar fácilmente la guitarra con los cinco dedos de ambas manos en cada una de sus seis cuerdas. Con principalmente en este 1er. EBook de Principios de Música con los 9 circuitos del Requinto individual en el Diapasón de la guitarra paso a paso y el séptimo EBook que explica de Principios de Música, Instrumentos musicales, de canto y de músicos para comprender más su utilización y tener un fácil manejo de los instrumentos musicales y en las seis cuerdas de la guitarra con cualquier dedo de ambas manos para poder aprender a tocarla fácil y así poder usar fácilmente y tocar mejor la música que enseñan y tocan los grandes y famosos Músicos y Guitarristas del Mundo.
El Proyecto se puede accesar desde dos sitios; en el sitio 1: es donde están los Productos cargados / subidos ó uploaded individualmente. El Sitio 2: es donde se presentan los productos en una lista todos los productos creados y cuenta con fotografías, platicas y consejos de la música, piano y diversos conceptos.
 
                                    PRODUCCION
El primer EBook son principios de música y como tocar paso a paso los recorridos con los nombres de los tonos en los Circuitos del Requinto individual y Grupos de tonos armónicos naturales de la Guitarra. Como están formadas las notas de la Guitarra con cada uno de su Tono natural mayor y paso a paso los 9 Recorridos en circuitos en la Guitarra Requinto individual en todos los Trastes del Diapasón y se conocerán los pasos de cómo tocar las cuerdas de la guitarra con todos los dedos sincronizados de ambas manos con el dedo indicado de ambas manos en cada una de las seis cuerdas EBooks traducidos en inglés y español.
EBook con más EBooks y Videos de regalos directos a los e-mails subscritos y más EBooks y Videos de cursos para conocer como agilizar sencillamente los dedos de ambas manos, como hacerle a la guitarra un óptimo ajuste al encordar y afinar la Guitarra para su buena y optima utilización y aprender más fácilmente la música, canciones y las músicas que enseñan los famosos, músicos y guitarristas famosos del mundo. 
Simple libro electrónico EBook estructurado para leer de 28 páginas en Español traducido al inglés de Principios de Música y paso a paso Procedimientos de varios circuitos de Requinto Individual de los Tonos Naturales Mayores y simples Videos fáciles demostración para enseñar y ver cómo se practica y como tocar el Requinto Individual con todos los dedos de ambas manos en el Diapasón de una Guitarra.
El primer libro electrónico EBook presenta los principios de música y varias partes de un Requinto individual secuencial y varios grupos harmónicos de regalo a los e-mails subcritos del Requinto Individual de los Tonos Harmónicos Naturales Mayores entre todos los nueve 5 Circuitos principales y 4 Adjuntos al Requinto Individual de los Tonos Mayores Naturales que se enseñan en el EBook que son y están en todo el Diapasón interno y externo de la Guitarra.
How to Music Principles & Guitar Requinto Individual Natural Major Pitched Sounds Tours with all Fingers both Hands | EBook de Principios de Música y del Requinto Individual de los Tonos Mayores Naturales en todo el Diapasón de la Guitarra con todos los dedos de ambas manos
 
EBook de 28 péginas para niños, niñas, jovenes y mayores de edad para conocer de los Principios de Música y seguir los 9 recorridos Circuitos del Requinto Individual de los Tonos Mayores Naturales en todos los trastes del diapason de la Guitarra para tocarse despues Ritmica y Harmonicamente.
How to Successful initial Guitar Requinto | Como iniciar a un Requinto individual exitosamente
 
How to Stringing Tight and Tune a Guitar optimally | Como ajustar; ecordar, ajustar y afinar una guitarra optimamente
 
How to Play Guitar Strings with each Five fingers both hand | Como tocar las Cuerdas de la Guitarra con todos los de dos de ambas manos
 
How to Trace fingers on fretboard guitar body strings | Como trazar / desplazar nuestros dedos en las uerdas del Diapasón de la Guitarra
 
How to trace a Circuit of Requinto Natural Major Tones Pitched Sounds | Como trazar un Circuito del Requinto de los Tonos Mayores Sonidos Naturales
 
How To Be Musicians Musical Instruments and Music principles for Play Sing and Make Music | Como son los Músicos, los Instrumentos Musicales y Principios de Música para Tocarla Cantar y Hacer Música
 
Love Poem eBook to Read and Sing! #HeForShe For who Loves to Read for who Loves Make Do Poems and Sing it For She! | EBook Poema de Amor para Leer y Cantar #HeForShe Para quien Ama Leer para quien Ama Hacer y Crear Poemas y Cantarlos para Ella
 
How to Successful Guitar Requinto | Play Guitar Strings with each 5 fingers | Trace Frets on Fingerboard guitar body strings | Como tocar un Exitoso Requinto Indiviaual / Como tocar las Cuerdas de la Guitarra con los 5 dedos / Como Desplazar nuestros dedos entre las Cuierdas de la Guitarra "OFERTA DE 3 PRODUCTOS POR EL PRECIO DE 2."
 
How to successful Requinto with a Pick on Guitar Strings | Como tocar un Exitoso Requinto individual con una Púa en las Cuerdas de la Guitarra
 
How to a successful Play Rhythmic Requinto Guitar Pitched Sounds | Como Tocar Exitosamente Sonidos individuales Rítmicos en la Guitarra

Pagaré la publicidad que ya estoy haciendo de este mi proyecto ya terminado de realizar para comercializar con el totalmente publicidad que estoy realizando por país en Facebook (con  mis demás páginas realizadas si se necesita) páginas ya iniciadas aún sin poner en marcha totalmente. Estudiar para aprender a  publicarme con el Marketing Video servicio nuevo en YouTube y hacer Video YouTube en Vivo y publicaré mis EBooks y Videos con el nuevo Video en vivo de YouTube.

story:
The Band. 

We are The V´s from Berlin and since 2011, we stand for wild, aggressive, straight-forward Rock and Roll"

We are experienced Live and Studio Musicians and after releasing our debut Album "DAWN" in 2013 and "NARCOLEPSY GIRL Ep." in  2016, we are ready now to record our second LP.

 

Why we want you on board.

Producing an album is not an easy task. You may do it for a few bucks but doing it properly sometimes requires collaboration of different people who have the means (studio-microphones-mixer-etc.) and the knowledge necessary to take your music a step further. That means the bands need to spend a certain amount of money to achieve the best quality possible. That’s why we ask for your support in this matter.

 

The Album.

We are not looking to make profit out of your donations, we really just want to provide you with the best version of our music possible. That’s why everybody who collaborates with 10€ or more will get at least one exclusive pre-sale digital download of the finished product.

Here's some of the expenses we need to cover :

  • Recordings 
  • Mixing 
  • Mastering
  • Album Replication (Artwork-packaging)
  • Perks Cost.

The album is comprised of 8 new songs, 1 cover song & 3 bonus tracks.  

 

Perks!

Besides the album, we have these exclusives 3D Figurines from Staramba for our backers..!!!!  

 

Some More About Us You Should Know:

We have a loyal fan base since 2011 and played in most of the best venues in what is currently our hometown: "Hard Rock Cafe, Rock at Sage, Magnet Club, White Trash, Urban Spree, Wild at Heart, Frannz Club, Tiefgrund...just to mention some but the list goes on"  

In 2015 we won the Hard Rock Rising contest in Berlin.

Here's a review of that night:

 

The Berliner Radio station Star FM promoted The V's on their show "Made In Berlin"  and has booked us as Special guest for the Night of your life event in Berlin. You'll find more reviews on the Press tab on our website.

We have self released a bunch of Music Videos:

 

 

The Impact.

We are not supported by any record label yet, therefore we decided to include you in this journey. 

There is a minimum goal that will allow us to achieve the main points of the whole production process. The more money we raise, the better the quality and the wider the reach of the band’s second album will be.

We are more than ready to jump into the studio and give our best to give YOU amazing tunes. This time, we'll release songs in Spanish.

 

Risks & Challenges

There's no risk and there's no challenge that will keep us from making this happen. We know we count on you because you can always count with us.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't join this journey financially, you're just one click away from letting your friends know about us and our music by sharing this campaign on all your social media sites (e.g.: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc).

Thank you so much and keep faith in us. You won't regret it. 

IT´S THE V´S, THAT'S ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW !!!

Some More About Us You Should Know:
We have a loyal fan base since 2011 and played in most of the best venues in what is currently our hometown: "Hard Rock Cafe, Rock at Sage, Magnet Club, White Trash, Urban Spree, Wild at Heart, Frannz Club, Tiefgrund...just to mention some but the list goes on"  
In 2015 we won the Hard Rock Rising contest in Berlin.

Here's a review of that night:

 
The Berliner Radio station Star FM promoted The V's on their show "Made In Berlin"  and has booked us as Special guest for the Night of your life event in Berlin. You'll find more reviews on the Press tab on our website.
We have self released a bunch of Music Videos:


 

 
The Impact.
We are not supported by any record label yet, therefore we decided to include you in this journey. 
There is a minimum goal that will allow us to achieve the main points of the whole production process. The more money we raise, the better the quality and the wider the reach of the band’s second album will be.
We are more than ready to jump into the studio and give our best to give YOU amazing tunes. This time, we'll release songs in Spanish.
 

Risks & Challenges
There's no risk and there's no challenge that will keep us from making this happen. We know we count on you because you can always count with us.  
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't join this journey financially, you're just one click away from letting your friends know about us and our music by sharing this campaign on all your social media sites (e.g.: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc).Thank you so much and keep faith in us. You won't regret it. IT´S THE V´S, THAT'S ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW !!!

story:
MohaviSoul’s Hometown Blues Music

  • We’re MohaviSoul from San Diego California……Our original Contemporary Bluegrass music is a passion from our soul, rooted in Folk and Americana!! We’re a 6-piece talented and award-winning group of musicians formed in 2012 by singer-songwriters Mark Miller and Randy Hanson.
  • We’re a working band and are completing our 3rd CD of original songs that are the essence of our new and fresh story telling in music. We are trying to raise $7,000 to cover the production and distribution costs, of our new CD Hometown Blues
  • But we can’t do it without you…so please help out a few working boys that need your support by preordering and donating for a perk and we’ll get this new music out together…………but we need you to join us to build and share our musical journey right now!!!!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to raise $7,000 to record, produce, and distribute our new music and two music videos to showcase our journey.
  • We have some great perks from digital downloads, to swag, hanging with the band, a private concert or a song written and performed for you.
  • Any funds received short of our goal will go towards presale of our CD to donors as well as covering some of the production costs.

The Impact

  • There is so much new music but few know what a rich Bluegrass history is centered in San Diego and SoCal. From Chris Thile and Nickle Creek, Chris Hillman, Bernie Leadon, Wayne Rice, Deering Banjos, Stuart Duncan, Ron Block, John Moore, Dennis Caplinger, Alison Brown, and many more as documented by Rick Bowman in his history of San Diego Bluegrass Documentary “Banjos, Bluegrass & Squirrel Barkers” ….MohaviSoul is part of the new sound in SoCal and along with a few other progressive groups is writing a new chapter to the history of Contemporary Bluegrass from SoCal.
  • We are story tellers and song writers and our third CD tops the successful production of two EPs of original MohaviSoul music. Our second EP, Blue Diesel, was award winning and receive worlwide airplay. Hometown Blues is full of new stories and melodies that will have you humming all day and feeling the images and tales wrapped inside our music.
  • We hope that you can invest in our project and stand beside us to help grow our music and the magic and tradition of Contemporary Bluegrass and Americana.

Risks & Challenges

  • We have recorded and produced before so this CD will happen and will leave its mark on the national music scene.
  • We also plan to help fund our project with CD sales at festivals, and through licensing our songs to other artists or outlets that find our music just right for their project too.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.
  • If you can’t donate please help us get the word out by sharing this with others and coming to our shows. Make some noise about our new soul music, MohaviSoul style that is shaking up the Bluegrass world with our rich SoCal traditions.

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/mohavisoul-f...

story:
The unitedsound.org Music For All Campaign

United Sound is a non-profit organization whose mission is to provide musical performance experiences for students with special needs through peer mentorship. 

The majority of middle, junior and high schools are not able to offer a full range of musical opportunities for students with special needs.  Yet, those currently involved in United Sound programs know that the joy of learning and performing in an ensemble can be life-changing.  We believe all children should have access to this opportunity.  It is our goal to support individual special education teachers, music educators and peer mentors in creating their own United Sound program. 

The unitedsound.org team is working hard to put your donations to work by creating life-changing experiences through music for students with special needs and their peer mentors.

Many of you have asked, "How can I contribute to United Sound's work and help to impact tens of thousands of students in the United States?”

Donate now to help US provide MUSIC FOR ALL in our schools.  Our sponsorship perks are listed but any amount is greatly appreciated!  

What Has United Sound Done So Far?

http://www.unitedsound.org/impact/

 

This amazing school-based instrumental music club for students with disabilities and their peer mentors is dedicated to promoting social involvement through shared ensemble performance experience.  United Sound joins students with and without disabilities to learn and perform in the band or orchestra setting together.

http://www.unitedsound.org/watch

What We Need

We need your help prior finding organizations and individuals that will help donate and help identify those who will match donations dollar-for-dollar. We have commitments from givingtext.org and eduPOWERED Media and amazing support from our existing donors and sponsors. With your help we hope to have all donations matched up-to our 100K goal.

The majority of high schools don't have band and orchestra music opportunities for students with special needs. Those involved know that the joy of learning in and performing with an ensemble can be life-changing. All children should have this opportunity. Our goal is to support individual special education teachers, music educators, and student peer mentors in creating their own United Sound programs. These after school clubs will also operate as performing ensembles through training, support, and organizational resources so that all children have access to meaningful authentic music education and musical experiences.

The program is run primarily by an individual school band or orchestra directors and a school special education teacher, with support from  United Sound in the form of specialized training, financial support, and organizational resources. With assistance from student volunteers (Peer Mentors), New Musicians learn to play the instrument of their choice at a personally modified level. Learning first in lesson format and ultimately transitioning to rehearsals with recorded music, the New Musicians learn a piece of music that they will then perform live in concert, once per semester, with their Peer Mentors and a full instrumental support ensemble.

Students who participate in United Sound programs are learning to be musicians. Making music together is a powerful force for learning, growth, friendship and understanding. Music is a language that transcends disability and the relationships formed in this way will truly resonate for all children involved.

Why Do We Need Your Financial Support?

We’ve built fantastic curriculum and resources that students, new musicians, and teachers love, but we need your help to bring these tools and resources to more schools. Your support will provide in-person training for teachers and allow them to add unitedsound.org music clubs to the after school schedule and afford those the opportunity to organize concerts and events around the students’ efforts.

Among nonprofits, United Sound is incredibly cost-effective. We have low administrative costs of <5%.  To date, all of our administrative costs are already covered by existing donors.  So are the costs of creating our fantastic specialized training tutorials.

So, every dollar you donate will be used only on expanding access to music education and inclusion, by putting programs in schools that are currently unavailable and not taught.

Beyond Money— We Need Your Help Spreading The Word!

At its heart, United Sound is a grassroots movement driven by parents, teachers, musicians, and students who want students with special needs to have access and to be included through music in the schools. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help make history and build a legacy of leadership and inclusion. Anyone, anywhere can organize United Sound awareness events. We’re working on making United Sound tutorials available in multiple languages. No experience needed. Ages high school and college.

What Is An Awareness Campaign?

An awareness campaign is a way for you and your community to pay it forward by spreading the word through event driven activities about this crowdfunding opportunity. Also help us engage with those who wish to match donations.

Ways You Can Help:

Ask your local school to organize a United Sound awareness event. Share this video, handout, or sample email.

Spread the word about #unitedsoundmusic on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube.  

https://www.facebook.com/unitedsoundmusic/

https://twitter.com/julie_duty

https://www.instagram.com/united_sound/

https://www.instagram.com/united_sound/

91% of Americans report their cell phone is within reach 24/7 so help us spread the word by text. Let people know to please text ‘GIVE’ to 480-744-7770 All text marketing for this campaign is managed and sponsored by our partners at givingtext.org Feel free to text away!

Recruit a local group — boy scouts club, church, university, veterans, band/orchestra parents group or labor union. Want a unique keyword (texting word) added to your giving text campaign, no problem ( example Text “MDHS” to 480-744-7770 ) simply request it by texting us your desired keyword and we’ll be glad to assist (free of charge).

Join eduPOWERED Giving Text’s Worldwide Concert Series at the link below and they’ll donate 50% of all purchased premium or plus subscription plans* http://www.givingtext.org/edupowered/  to unitedsound.org during the duration of this campaign! Each subscription includes a fully licensed and orchestrated PDF downloadable version of Break the Cycle by Michael Patrick, and arranged by Dr. Dan Puccio for you to provide to your organization (a $100 value). You can also see this opportunity in one of the perks during this campaign. The arrangement is convertible for rock band, concert band, orchestra and vocalists!  

Text ‘MUSIC’ to 480-744-7770 for more information on this arrangement. 

The work we do changes students’ lives in a profound way. Watch the Music For All National Honor Band Performance with United Sound. Imagine how together we can change lives!

https://youtu.be/oS_EAQkrsXo

Every dollar you give will touch one student, who will learn about your support. We thank you, and so do the students.

Our Campaign and Presentations In The Press

Music For All  (video): “A look inside the 2016 Unitedsound.org Ensemble” https://youtu.be/oS_EAQkrsXo

United Buzz: unitedsound.com Ups Goal, Aims To Impact Tens of Tens Of Thousands Of Students www.unitedbuzz.org

Frequently Asked Questions

Are You a Non-Profit?  Can I Write-Off My Contribution With My Taxes?

Yes, United Sound is registered as a public 501(c)(3) nonprofit. Contributions to United Sound are tax-deductible to the extent permitted by law. United Sound's  tax ID number is 47-1534338

How Can I get a Tax Deductible Receipt?

When you contribute, you will receive an email confirming your contribution.  This email receipt can be used for tax deductible purposes. For all contributions over $250, you will receive an official receipt for tax-reporting purposes by email after the campaign ends.

How Will The Funds Be Used?

Our approximate cost breakdown is as follows. Note: the costs below do not account for all our staff costs as those have been already funded. The costs below are to the best of our knowledge given our experience to-date.  Changing public education is not quite as simple as these charts make it seem.

In addition, the cost of running the United Sound Music For All Campaign is $10,000. Half of this is spent towards prizes for the participating schools and educators, and the remainder is spent on supporting the effort.

If Major Donors Are Already Supporting You, Why Should I Help?

To date, we’ve been privileged to have the support of many generous individuals, corporations, and foundations. But to sustain our organization for the long haul, we need to engage parents, community members, and new businesses. All donations, regardless of the amount, help further our mission and allow us to reach more students. And because many of the gifts are matched by some of our largest donors, your support is leveraged for greater impact.  

 

Thank you for all your support! Please visit us for more information at www.unitedsound.org

story:
Hey everyone,

I'm Chris LeDrew, a singer/songwriter who was born and raised in the culturally-rich Canadian city of St. John's, Newfoundland. I'm working on my third album and I'm hoping you want to get involved early and help me fund this process.

My first album Too Commercial was created with the support of fans, and it helped make the whole thing so much more enjoyable. Knowing that people were waiting for my music kept me going through the highs and lows of the writing, recording, and mixing process.

Now, thanks to Indiegogo, I can make the process of creating my album so much more interactive. I am looking forward to keep you all in the loop as I refine the songs I have written, as I create new ones, and as I work with my producer Joshua Grange (a seasoned musician/producer who currently plays in Sheryl Crow's band) in Nashville to record my most interesting and personally satisfying album so far.

I want to welcome you directly into the album-making process through videos, email updates and some fun perks. I will include you in every step of the album's progress from start to finish, because your support is key to my success.


This album is a collection of songs that I believe reflect the culmination of all my experiences as an artist in vastly changing world. My dream would be to take this album on a tour of North America and play intimate venues that allow me to tell my story in song to attentive, discerning audiences. Most of all, this album will provide me with the opportunity to connect with each and every one of you as we work together to help this project reaches its creative potential.

How can you get involved?

You just have to click one of the perks at the side of this page. You can decide to be part of the advance team – the very first people to receive my new music; or you raise the stakes by choosing a higher investment and a greater reward. We have everything from Skype access to parts of the process, to admission to the exclusive listening party, or you can host a house concert and invite all of your friends. And we'll be adding more perks as the campaign develops.

Once you have chosen your perk, we will add you to our mailing list so you can stay in the loop via updates, photos and videos. I'll be posting from Nashville during the recording stage so you'll get a glimpse of that great city and you'll see (and hear) me working with some great musicians.

All funds raised will go directly towards costs associated with the recording, including musician's fees, studio time, and manufacturing of product. If we do happen to fall short of our projected goal, we will amend the budget to make it work in the best and most creative way we can. Recording in the USA makes it necessary to pursue a financial goal that will accommodate the challenges of Canadian currency, but together we can make this happen.

In the past I have managed budgets for two solo albums as well as one for Brothers in Stereo, so you can pledge with confidence that this campaign is in good hands and will be managed with integrity and appreciation.

Need a little more background before you commit?

I have spent much of my life enjoying a busy and successful music career in Canada and abroad. In the past two decades I have released two solo albums as well as one with the band Brothers in Stereo. These albums have opened up my music to an international fan base and have provided me with the opportunity to perform all over North America in clubs, concert halls, arenas, and on national radio/television shows. I am currently preparing to record my third solo album in Nashville with Joshua Grange, an experienced musician/producer hailing from Hollywood, California who now calls Nashville his home. He currently plays in Sheryl Crow's band and has worked with the Dixie Chicks, Dwight Yoakam,  KD Lang, Ryan Adams, and more. We have connected on a musical level that has resulted in us co-writing many of the album's new songs. Josh has inspired and encouraged me to explore new sounds and approaches that allow me to venture beyond the musical horizons of my former work. We will be working in his new Nashville studio called Resistor, which you saw in my video above. In the meantime, I invite you to check out my 2006 album Stronger Man here on my Soundcloud page of you'd like a taste of my earlier work: 

https://soundcloud.com/chrisledrew/sets/stronger-man-1

Thank you for reading, and I hope that you come on board with me.

(Photos and video by Paul Kinsman Arts & Media)

you saw in my video above. In the meantime, I invite you to check out my 2006 album Stronger Man here on my Soundcloud page of you'd like a taste of my earlier work: https://soundcloud.com/chrisledrew/sets/stronger-man-1Thank you for reading, and I hope that you come on board with me.
(Photos
and video by Paul Kinsman Arts & Media)

story:
New Music - New Album

It's been three years since our last recording and the long wait is over. We've spent a great deal of time and our own resources over the summer writing and finding material, and recording a brand new album - our sixth for those who are counting! 

The album features music that we all feel strongly communicates who we are and will connect with a huge cross-section of listeners. That's why we decided to invest ourselves and get the project moving as fast as possible.

We've managed to fund all the recording and tracking, but now we need you to partner with us so we can have the album out this fall. Upcoming expenses include:

• Mixing

• Photography

• Licensing and publishing

• Publicity and promotion

• Possible music videos

• Postage

Whether you are able to invest financially or not, please help us by sharing this campaign with your friends and family. We need all the folk we can get to link with us and help make this happen quickly! Thank You!

story:
Stephen and Jasselle Cirino are the creators of the inspirational youth movement, Youthful Noize. Stephen Cirino is a qualified and forward thinking music executive with over 10 years of experience in music, entertainment, branding and consulting. Stephen worked for Sony Music Entertainment for seven years and started his own music management, distribution, and business development company Future Management LLC. During his experience in the music industry, Cirino realized the missing link of positive and inspirational music and content needed for today’s youth. Stephen’s wife, Jasselle Cirino, is a seasoned teacher and now literacy specialist with over 8 years of experience in education. Jasselle currently sits on the board of Whole Brain Teaching, a movement of teaching through active learning and she was recently featured as an educator on the nationally syndicated TV station, PBS. Jasselle, with her experience as an inner city educator, noticed the missing link of positive influences outside of the school environment for her students. With their knowledge, Stephen and Jasselle collectively came together to fill in this void to create Youthful Noize.
 

Personal Note from Steve and Jasselle: In addition to creating and releasing music, through this campaign we hope to create even more of an impact. Our vision is to create  a positive platform where today's youth can discover a fire for God and spread the message of positivity and hope found in His Word.  We seek to expand our movement through coffee houses sponsored by community churches and youth groups throughout the country, creating a ministry that respects young people as artists and supports them in cultivating their own musical talents as an instrument for God.  This all culminates into our vision of starting an after-school arts program, where our youth have a safe space to explore the arts and discover their abilities without the outside negative influences or pressures of the world. Your contribution will make a direct and positive impact on the youth of our country.

Youthful Noize will have the access to get all music Chapter releases into brick and mortar retailers such as Wal-Mart, Amazon, Lifeway, and Family Christian, along with digital retailers such as iTunes and Spotify via the music distributor Future Management LLC. In order to properly release Youthful Noize to market, there are costs involved, in which the total goal of $3750 will cover the cost of such items not limited to:

  • Manufacturing Youthful Noize CD packages
  • Paying the costs of music licensing for the cover songs
  • Hiring a graphic design artist to create the brand
  • Hiring a photographer and videographer for Youthful Noize
  • Creating the Youthful Noize website
  • Creating branded content to be used to launch the Youthful Noize social media pages for Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Snapchat, and Periscope
  • Paying for advertising costs for product positioning at brick and mortar retailers
  • Paying for radio and television advertising
  • Paying for social media advertising                                                                                                            

As a contributor, you will have the access to receive some amazing perks such as two free tickets to the Holy Land park in Florida, your name as a contributor in the album credits, an exclusive music CD, the digital music download of the Chapter 1 album delivered two weeks before the official release date, a signed poster, social media shout-outs, Joggers, Hoodies, Winter Beanies, and T-Shirts.

If we do not reach our goal, we will use any funding received to manufacturer the CD packages and to appropriately license the music so the Chapter 1 album can be released.

If you are currently unable to provide funds towards the campaign, you can still help! Please feel free to share this campaign via social media to your friends, family, and following. This gesture will be highly appreciated from our team and will help to launch Youthful Noize. You can use the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you so much for your support, we truly appreciate it!

story:
Welcome to my fundraising campaign for Notations & Sketches, the debut album from award-winning classical pianist Alexander Soares (that's me!). I recently graduated from the doctoral course at Guildhall School of Music & Drama, where I developed a passion for French 20th-Century music, particularly the composers Boulez, Dutilleux and Messiaen. I was lucky enough to perform works by these composers in some of the UK's most important venues, including The Royal Festival Hall, and several live broadcasts on BBC Radio 3. These opportunities have helped to grow my career, and firmly established my reputation as an emerging artist specialising in this repertoire.

I’m now at a pivotal stage of my career development, and have been offered the opportunity to record my debut album. I have secured £6000 , but I am asking for YOUR help in raising the remaining £4,500 for the album.

Having spent the last 8 years immersed in the study of Boulez, Dutilleux and Messiaen, I have chosen to record this repertoire for my debut album. The album will be a significant and timely addition to the discography: I have chosen to record a largely unknown work by Messiaen that was first discovered in his sketchbooks in 2013. 2016 also marks the centenary of Dutilleux’s birth. 

Your support will help me to bring this album to life in December 2016, when I begin recording, and will help me to take my next steps forward in my musical career.

I'm absolutely delighted that the project is being supported by City Music Foundation, a charitable organisation based in the heart of London that supports emerging musicians such as myself. Thanks to their support, I have sourced and funded grammy award winning producer, Andrew Keener, and renowned recording engineer Oscar Torres.

Thanks to my affiliation with Guildhall School of Music & Drama, the City of London has offered me the use Milton Court Concert Hall for 3 days in December. This is one of London's finest acoustics, and will ensure the highest recording quality.

I am asking for your support to help me raise the final costs to produce the album:

  • Hire for Milton Court: £3600
  • Piano tuning: £270
  • Production Costs (1000 CDs): £630

Total: £4500

Your support, no matter how small, will play a crucial part in helping me to achieve my goal to record this album and to take the important next steps in progressing in my musical career.

In order to raise the needed funds for this project, I am offering everyone the opportunity to pre-order the CD for £20 for their support. This will feature stunning album artwork from Liz K. Miller (prizewinning graduate of the Royal Academy of Arts) and extensive liner notes. There are a host of other rewards for supporting the project, including named sponsorship in the album sleeve, masterclasses with Alexander, private recitals, and a corporate package including your company logo on the album!

Any surplus funds will be used for promotion of the CD (recitals, tours & competitions) or held for the next album.

I am dedicated to ensuring this project takes place. Anyone who supports this project will have a unique opportunity to directly have a hand in the creation and making of my first album. And please do share this project with your friends, family and networks on social media!

story:
Hi :)

Hi! My name is AK and I’m an artist that developed from YouTube. To begin, I started making covers and remixing songs of well-known mainstream artist by rewriting the words to their lyrics and uploading it to YouTube. After only a couple videos of me doing that my channel started to progress rather quickly until eventually it became home to over 171,000 subscribers. However, many of my supporters have no clue that I’m a “one man show” and everything that has been accomplished thus far has been solely with my own efforts and no financial backing or in other words… (Me Backing Me) With the growth of my channel and brand, I realized that for me to truly reach my potential it can no longer be that way and I must start a fundraising campaign, which brought me here.

This campaign will truly help me get to the next step in my career by providing me with the support to finish my debut album, marketing and promotion, and tour support for my very first tour. So, if you back this project you’re not only helping me do all those things, but you’re also helping me make a life choice as I’ve come to this fork in the road that decides my career path. With that being said each contributor is greatly appreciated and plays a huge role in my growth rather you just help spread the word or contribute and for that I’m truly grateful.  

Goal

It is my goal to raise $30,000 which will help cover the cost of:

  • Camera Equipment and video production
  • Album production 
  • Tour Support 
  • Marketing and Promotion 
  • Indiegogo fees

The tour now consists of six cities that are listed below. However, more cities will be added if the goal is exceeded:

  • Atlanta, Georgia: TBA: TBA
  • Austin, Texas: March 17th, 2017-March 19th, 2017: SXSW
  • Houston, Texas: February 3rd, 2017-February 5th, 2017: TBA
  • Indio, California: April 21st, 2017-April 23rd, 2017: Coachella
  • Los Angeles, California: TBA: TBA
  • New York, New York: TBA: TBA

What happens if the project is not fully funded?

Well, hopefully I won’t run into this problem :-), but if this should happen I will reassess the tour cities and re-release updated tour locations based off what is raised. Also, if the the budget is exceeded I will add more tour cities (crossing my fingers). Nonetheless, the album will still be completed! Further details for the tour will be released once the campaign is over.

Incentives

I put a lot of thought into my perk packages because I wanted my contributors to feel greatly appreciated. This campaign means so much to me and I wanted that to be communicated through my perks which is why I made my perks personal for my supporters. My perks include skype calls, an unreleased mixtape, private meet and greets, and all types of incentives that bring me and my supporters closer. Not only does your contribution put me closer to my goal, but it also brings my supporters closer to me as an artist.

Other Ways You Can Help...

Maybe you can’t back this project financially and that’s okay… but you can still help!The more people that know about my campaign the better. If you can’t make a monetary contribution sharing my campaign or spreading the word using my Indiegogo social media sharing tools makes a huge difference and is still greatly appreciated :)

Thank you to the stars and back. Your support means everything!

story:
A Journey into Friendship

Hello friends!

My name is Charisah Joy and I am excited to announce the recording of my first album!

When I was younger, I used to have bad dreams. I would wake up afraid, feeling totally lost and alone. In those moments, I remember the most gentle, kind and strong voice would comfort me saying, "Don't be afraid, I am with you." I would feel as if I was enfolded in an invisible embrace and yet it was the most real thing in the world. I was hidden in love; hidden in the arms of my God, my father, my friend and everything was okay.

More than a collection of songs I’ve written, these songs are open pages from my heart trying to capture this journey of friendship, intimacy, identity, and love. 

To those who haven’t experienced this kind of love and friendship, this is an invitation to begin one of the most incredible journeys of your life. For those who have experienced intimacy with God, I want to take moments of my own friendship with Jesus, and offer them as a backing track to your journey into the depth of His affection for you! 

My heart is that these songs will be seeds. Seeds of expectation for more. More awareness of His involvement in our lives, more desire for His nearness, more joy in His presence, more freedom through the truth of the Gospel!

 

The Invitation:

I invite you to be a part of this process with me! It is not only an honor and a joy to involve others in this process, but it is also essential. I know I cannot, nor would I want to do it alone! Here is how you can be a part!!

I am raising $10,500 to cover the cost of studio hours, musicians, a producer and 1,000 hard copies of the album.

Here are the details: On the 24th of July I will be recording a single from the album called "Illuminate" to be released at this campaigns half point!

Over the summer, I will raise the money along side preparing to get into the studio. 

And then in October we start recording!  

My goal is that YOU will be relaxing, listening to "Friend of mine" in your living room by Spring 2017! 

Thank you for joining me in releasing that much more truth & beauty into our lovely world.  

Yours Truly, Charisah Joy

 

 

 

About Me:

I grew up in a household where our value for the presence of God equaled that of our value for the impact of excellent music. When I was 15, I began leading worship on a regular basis, since then I have had the pleasure of worshiping with friends across multiple genres, denominations and nations! My relentless desire has been to partnering with Holy Spirit to bring the unique message he has to the ones He has gathered every time. My favorite Ice cream is mint chocolate chip and if I were an animal, I would be an Otter.

story:
In short...

My name is Kyler Wilson.  Most of anyone who knows me knows that I do movies. A lot of people don't know however that I have a musical side as well.  My father was a singer songwriter for everyone and their mamma on country radio in the 90s and it would seem that some of that talent fell to me.  

This campaign is designed to raise the money not only for recording but also mastering and distribution.  These songs are very important to me and I can't help but want to share them with the world.  With your help, I know that is possible.

Without your contributions this project won't be possible.  I could only ever hope to achieve a fraction of what I am aiming for without the appropriate funds to do so.  Every single dollar donated to this campaign is hugely impactful.

Here is what I need, and here is what you get...

I need 7000 dollars total to go into the studio.  I need another 1500 to 2000 dollars to master and then another 1500 to 2000 to start initial distribution.  I have a few private investors that have come in on the project that is helping with a small chunk of it all. But it won't be enough to execute the project correctly without your additional contributions.  

That said, if the entire amount isn't achieved, don't fret. We can still do amazing things with the money we generate.  And I will continue to fund raise through other means regardless.  But if we can get enough of you excited about the project, I feel certain that the money will be pledged in no time

The Impact

This project is so important to me.  I had left music behind a few years ago. But on my journey across the country I found my words again. And in a huge way.  I am writing better than I ever have in my life.  I feel like these songs are the type of songs that can truly touch the hearts of the listener.

While I have never released an album before, I do have a great reputation in following projects through completion.  And I fell skilled enough to not just complete the project but also make it great

Risks

It's no shocker here.  Music is one of the most easily accessible things in the world now.  You can literally write, record, and release a song in an afternoon now without ever leaving your house.  With that said, there is always the possibility that this music gets looked over like so many other artists.  But I truly believe that once my music is heard, that people will connect with it on a far more personal level than you might expect.  This music comes completely from the heart without thought of commercial-ability.  I think the music will speak for itself and in its own right be what people want to hear, once they hear it.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially, its ok.  I don't expect people to take out a second mortgage on their house to help me make a record....Unless you just really really want to.  

But if you don't have the ability to help financially, please help by spreading the word.  Share this with your friends and family that you think might want to be part of something special.  At the end of the day, 10 dollars, however small of a contribution you might think that is, is HUGE to me.  So please share with anyone that you think might like this project. It really does make a world of difference.

While I have never released an album before, I do have a great reputation in following projects through completion.  And I fell skilled enough to not just complete the project but also make it great

Risks
It's no shocker here.  Music is one of the most easily accessible things in the world now.  You can literally write, record, and release a song in an afternoon now without ever leaving your house.  With that said, there is always the possibility that this music gets looked over like so many other artists.  But I truly believe that once my music is heard, that people will connect with it on a far more personal level than you might expect.  This music comes completely from the heart without thought of commercial-ability.  I think the music will speak for itself and in its own right be what people want to hear, once they hear it.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't help financially, its ok.  I don't expect people to take out a second mortgage on their house to help me make a record....Unless you just really really want to.  
But if you don't have the ability to help financially, please help by spreading the word.  Share this with your friends and family that you think might want to be part of something special.  At the end of the day, 10 dollars, however small of a contribution you might think that is, is HUGE to me.  So please share with anyone that you think might like this project. It really does make a world of difference.

story:
Short Summary

 

  • The story behind I.Am.Calm: 
    I took a yoga class and it wasn't just any yoga class, it was hot, it was humid and it was PACKED. I was slightly uneasy because when you're in such close quarters with other yogis a mountain pose gone wrong could leave you with a black eye. YOU KNOW?!

    *warning yogi nerd out moment about to happen*

    What happened next was interesting but needs some explaining.....In every yoga class the instructor recommends you set an intention or mantra to keep your breathing at ease and to stay in the present moment. The instructor listed off many phrases like "I love you" and "peace" but when the instructor said "I.Am.Calm." I felt something like a spirit enter my body and it hasn't really left since. 

    The whole class "I.Am.Calm." echoed in my head and after class it followed me out into the world. I found myself saying it everyday, With this phrase I was mentally able to press the reset button that made the world clearer. 

    The music in the record tells what new inspiration can feel like and how it can be channeled into a musical medium.

Joining me on this record will be a familiar cast of characters, Ed Kornhauser on piano, Mackenzie Leighton on bass. We will also have Grammy award winning Curtis Taylor on Trumpet and New York based and highly acclaimed Saxophonist Dayna Stephens! 

We will be recording this record in beautiful Pasadena under the supervision of recording engineer Nolan Shaheed (Marvin Gaye MD, Count Basie Orchestra) and we will once again work with Grammy Award winning producer Kamau Kenyatta.

What We Need & What You Get

The money raised will go to the following costs: recording, mixing, mastering, CD production, hotels during our recording process, art design, shipping costs...

Incentives

  • $15- Digital Download & name in thank yous
  • $30- Physical Copy (Shipping Included) 
    and name in thank yous
  • $50- Physical Copy + name in thank yous + personal thank you card 
  • $100 -  All above + A 12,16 or 32 (our choice) bar song composed for you! A video will be sent straight to your email of the song upon it's completion.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help that is OK. Your support is worth more so please if you can share this page to any and all social media you have access to and your work will be complete :)

story:
We are Beaucoup Blue a father & son roots americana group. We have  recorded three full length albums mainly financed/ funded personally, with the exception of some very generous patrons that have contributed to our cause.

To create, promote and record these albums takes a lot of time. When you are at the mercy of only personal financing capabilities, a great piece of music may get short shrift. We believe crowd funding is a way to get people in on the ground floor. The project in itself is still a “do it yourself” endeavor however, with enough support we will be able to release the most professional album in all facets;including recording, mixing, mastering, artwork and the final press and release.

There is so much that goes into a project even before a single note is recorded. Developing this work as father and son is a unique blessing.With your support we hope to continue this generational collaboration.

Beaucoup Blue has been recording and touring for over a decade. With this latest recording we wanted to capture both the intimate sound of the duo as well as the fuller experience of the quartet. The quartet includes two great friends, Jeff Sheard and Bill Zinno. Jeff Sheard (on drums), is a well established studio / touring musician from Toronto. Bill Zinno (upright bass), is a member of the Delaware Symphony Orchestra as well as a local Jazz stalwart. The album is recorded by Jim Salamone, a Grammy award winning producer & owner of Cambridge Sound Studios.The work done on this project has by far created one of our best efforts yet, and for that we are grateful.

With this crowd funding campaign, a long tradition of patronage to the arts can be continued in this modern world. Instead of just kings & queens or wealthy elite being the only ones in the past to contribute to the arts, everyday hard working people can have a hand and a say in who and what they want to support. So here we are asking for your support, so we can continue on with this family tradition & pass it a long to as many as we can.

story:
Hello, thank you for considering donating to our Indiegogo campaign. My name is Andy Owens and I am the leader of a group of people that put together a camp at the Burning Man festival every year in the desert of northern Nevada. Burning Man is a giant art festival held on a large dry lakebed in the BlackRockDesert. Every year 70,000 people gather and build a huge city out of nothing and then dismantle it and leave the wonderful desert space in a condition better than we found it.

I have been playing Bluegrass Music on a professional level for over forty years and when I discovered Burning Man I knew that these were my "peeps" that this was my thing, but the music there just didn't move me. I knew that I needed to bring my music, Bluegrass Music, live Bluegrass Music to Burning Man. So I did. I started a "themecamp" as we call it, a camp of people dedicated to a particular theme at Burning Man. Our theme is live Bluegrass Music and Hillbilly culture and food.

Over the last four years we have taken Bluegrass Music to Burning Man. We have mostly funded this out of my own pocket, but we need outside this year to increase our offering. We teach music lessons daily in our workshop tents. We teach beginners on mandolin, banjo, guitar and fiddle and we provide the instruments to do this. We also have nightly concerts by our professional house band, Black Rock Bluegrass, and we need a good safe, warm place to have our concerts, so we are raising money for a large 30x70 foot circus tent in which we plan to build our stage.

Indigogo likes you to list what the challenges are to this project. Anytime you go to Burning Man and set up a camp it is a huge challenge, but this is our fourth year out and we are going no matter what. We have two storage units out there, we have two artcars and we have fifty camp members, we’re going, don’t worry about that.

The tent we want to buy is 30x70 feet and is perfect for our camp size and for our stage. A tent like this typically costs about $5,000 but we have found one for $3100, we also need a trailer for it, about $1000. We have some instruements to teach on but we need more. Instruments for beginners aren’t fancy, about $100 each and we need about forty ten of each. These needs total around $6,000 so that is our goal. Of course our camp budget is much more than this, don’t think we aren’t also putting up major funds to make this happen, we just need help in this particular area. Last year we only taught banjo and had over twenty people every day, in fact we had to run it in shifts, we didn’t have enough banjos!!

Help us bring Bluegrass Music to the dusty masses at Burning Man!!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Steve Brock. My father was a musician. He played trombone in a dance band in college and loved playing songs from the 30s and 40s. When I was a kid, my influences were singer/songwriters such as James Taylor, Carole King, Billy Joel and Elton John. Like my father I also enjoyed the standards of the 40s and 50s. My style is unique because of these influences. Normally when I meet someone they assume I am into the acid rock genre, surprise, surprise. My songs have a message of love with lyrics of deep meaning behind them. As a performer, I thrive to change peoples thoughts and move them. 

On my new CD you will my favorite original tracks, I have an amazing and strong band we are all ready to hit the studio and make the magic happen, create the most amazing CD you have ever heard. An album that you will listen to over and over, every time hearing something new loving a new track each time and discovering new jewels within each song.  We promise you that you will love this album once we have finished.​

Our band has has already produced a single that will be a bonus track on this CD.

To listen to this single, click here.

What We Need

My producer, Michael Farrell, has given me a quote for the production team that I will be recording with. The cost is $2500 which is based on a 10 hour day of recording, with between 5 and 6 songs done per day with basic tracking including percussion and or guitar over dubs. I will be focusing on vocals on a separate day.

Production Team

Dori Amarilio (Engineer) was born into music. The son of a classically trained violinist and award winning composer, Dori was exposed to music from day one. He studied guitar at age 9, played professionally at 14, composed music at 16 and was a music director by age 17. Dori studied composition at the Berkley- endorsed School of Music Rimon, the Hollywood Musician's Institute and the UCLA film scoring program.

Dori Landed in Los Angeles after being hired as a musical director for a 3 month tour, playing every major city in South America. Performing with top musicians in the L.A. jazz scene earned Dori the reputation of a highly regarded and versatile guitar player with a special passion for Brazilian music.

Years in recording studios won him awards and the reputation of a sought after composer producer and highly intuitive score mixer in the Film, TV and Game Industry. His diverse portfolio features projects that range from working with legendary songwriter Mike Stoller on the album Amazon Moon, to composing for Oscar-winning director Charles Jarot; scoring a national Pontiac commercial, to composing cross cultural music for theater; composing cutting edge TV music, to producing orchestral soundtracks for major game titles utilizing Hollywood, Seattle and a range of European orchestras.
 

Due for a Grammy nomination, Dori is currently working on a unique project arranging traditional Brazilian music for a full orchestra. The first cut features world renouned percussionist Airto Moreira, with Dori conducting the Seattle symphony. Composing music for picture is Dori's primary passion. His scores benefit from his diverse musical background and experience, coupled with the expertise of producing soundtracks for picture. His music can eb heard daily on several major network TV shows.

 

Michael Farrell (Piano and Prouducer) debuted his first feature film score, Hell Baby, at the 2013 Sundance Film Festival with Thomas Lennon and Robert Ben Garant (Reno 911!). Since then, he has composed the original music for Comedy Central's hit late night show, @Midnight, starring Chris Hardwick.  Other composing credits include: Blunt Talk on Starz starring Patrick Stewart, Netflix' Wet Hot American Summer, and the documentary Kelly's Hollywood, including a collaboration with Australian Sony recording artist Lenka. As a songwriter, he has written with groundbreaking indie rock legend Morrissey for his album Ringleader of the Tormentors. Other songwriting partners include Grammy winner and soul artist Macy Gray (with will.i.am producing), and Australian star Ben Lee.   Michael toured with Morrissey from 2004-2008 and worked on a number of his recording projects, including the platinum You Are The Quarry, Ringleader of the Tormentors, Swords, and Live at Earl's Court. In 2015, Michael joined the house band playing keyboards and trumpet for the Emmy-award winning NBC hit Hollywood Game Night. He also completed a 2015 tour as keyboardist/multi-instrumentalist for the multi-platinum Canadian artist Sarah MacLachlan. He has toured as a multi-instrumentalist for Alanis Morissette, Macy Gray (musical director), Richie Sambora, Vanessa Carlton, Daniel Powter, Rita Wilson, V.V. Brown (musical director), and Mariah Carey. In recent years, Michael has worked as an associate musical director for NBC's America's Got Talent, Fox's American Idol and The X Factor, and ABC's Dance War.   His duties included onscreen performing, arranging, and recording and production of live tracks as well as coaching contestants.  Other recording or live clients include Anastacia, Five For Fighting, Thompson Square, Patti LaBelle, Ennio Morricone, 311, Jewel, Vanessa Hudgens, David Hasselhoff, and the Radio City Rockettes.

 

Tim Emmons (Bass) is an active freelance musician in Los Angeles California and a veteran of over two hundred and eighty film and television scores including Jurassic World, Dawn of the Planet of the Apes, Star Trek; Into Darkness, Mission Impossible 3 and 4, Super 8, Cars 2. John Carter, Up, Star Trek XI, X and Star Trek Into Darkness, The Tale of Desperaux, Lost, Battlestar Gallactica, Ratouille, The Simpsons, 2010 Winter Olympics, Family Guy, The Incredibles, Collateral Damage, The Negotiator, The Day After Tomorrow, Miss Congeniality, Something’s Gotta Give,The Wedding Planner, and the Muppet Family Christmas.

He has played in the pit and on stage for dozens of major theatrical productions including Curtains, Swing, Candide, Swan Lake, and Ragtime. Tim also developed the role of  “Uncle Chester”, the Beatnik bass player, in five different productions of “Forever Plaid”.  Gamers can hear him on the low end of the soundtracks of Fall of Liberty, Splinter Cell, Halo, Call of Duty, Jumper, Assassin’s Creed II, Advent Rising and Bioshock 2.

An eclectic musician, Tim has played Contrabass on recordings for Stevie Wonder and Beyonce, Barbara Streisand, Josh Groban, Justin Timberlake, Michael Buble, Kenny G, Andrea Boccelli, young opera phenomenon Jackie Evancho and “Popera” artists Katherine Jenkins and  Paul Potts as well as pop singers Rufus Wainright, Brandy, John Tesh, Celine Dion and Toni Braxton.

Tim has performed live with a diverse array of artists including Jazz vocalists Natalie Cole and Cheryl Bentyne of the Manhattan Transfer, Jazz guitar virtuosos Joe Pass and Herb Ellis, R&B pioneers Bo Diddley and Chuck Berry, master Jazz saxophonists Art Pepper, and Eddie Harris, Motown artists Mary Wells and Martha Reeves, Swing-Era staples Lionel Hampton and the Glenn Miller orchestra, British Invasion stalwarts Ian Whitcomb and Peter Noone of Herman’s Hermits, Musical Theater diva Liza Minelli, Blues maven Linda Hopkins, Disco queen Donna Summer, Hollywood legend Mickey Rooney, Broadway icons Carol Channing, Shirley Jones Theodore Bickel and John Raitt, Rock veteran Rod Stewart, Harlem Renaissance dance titans The Nicolas Brothers as well as scat-singing innovator Cab Calloway.

Tim is also a dedicated music educator and is on the faculty of Occidental College in Los Angeles where he conducted, and arranged for, the Jazz Ensemble for 18 seasons. He still teaches Electric Bass Guitar and Double Bass at OXY. In 2010 he was hired to teach undergraduate college level Theory and Counterpoint at Musician’s Institute Hollywood.

He also wrote the curriculum for his “Odd Meter Basslines” class at M.I. Tim is further involved in education as an adjunct faculty member at Colorado Mesa University, the University of Redlands, where he is also principal bass with the Redlands Symphony Orchestra. He is an adjunct faculty member at Cal State University Los Angeles, Azusa Pacific University, Occidental College and Pasadena City College.

Tim is the author of “Odd Meter Bass”, a book/CD Bass method published by Alfred Music. He is co-author, along with Fred Sokolow, of “Fretboard Roadmaps published by Hal Leonard Music. He is a contributor to “The Funkmasters; The Rhythm Sections of James Brown” and has written numerous articles for Bass Player magazine.

Tom Zygmont (Drums and Percussion) I am an experienced, freelance, drummer-percussionist, working in LA for more than 20 years. Recording/performance credits include Chuck Mangione, Johnny Mathis, Shirley Jones, Maureen McGovern, Karen Black, Hirth Martinez, Don Randi. I have a Masters of Music, (Percussion Performance), and am comfortable playing drum set, Latin perc, timp, and mallets, in any situation or genre. I was Head of the Percussion Department at the Eubanks Conservatory of Music for 17 years.
I believe that in playing the different percussion instruments, one finds that they influence each other, as does involvement with different forms of music. As a musician, this allows a more colorful palette for expression and feeling. 

What You Get

For your $10 donation, you will receive a digital copy of the CD at completion. For your $20 donation, you will receive a signed CD by me by mail. The signed CD is offered on all upper tier perks as well.

If our Funds goal is not met within our time frame, we will create an EP along with the already produced bonus track and send out a digital copy to each sponsor.  We will keep pushing for our fund goal and once that is met and we create the full album than we will also send you a digital copy of the full CD.  If you request a physical CD from me, I will send you one. This is only if we do not reach our goal 

Thank you so much in your support and Believing in us, we are so excited to get started and hear your feedback on how incredible the album sounds. ​

He is an adjunct faculty member at Cal State University Los Angeles, Azusa Pacific University, Occidental College and Pasadena City College.Tim is the author of “Odd Meter Bass”, a book/CD Bass method published by Alfred Music. He is co-author, along with Fred Sokolow, of “Fretboard Roadmaps published by Hal Leonard Music. He is a contributor to “The Funkmasters; The Rhythm Sections of James Brown” and has written numerous articles for Bass Player magazine.Tom Zygmont (Drums and Percussion) I am an experienced, freelance, drummer-percussionist, working in LA for more than 20 years. Recording/performance credits include Chuck Mangione, Johnny Mathis, Shirley Jones, Maureen McGovern, Karen Black, Hirth Martinez, Don Randi. I have a Masters of Music, (Percussion Performance), and am comfortable playing drum set, Latin perc, timp, and mallets, in any situation or genre. I was Head of the Percussion Department at the Eubanks Conservatory of Music for 17 years.I believe that in playing the different percussion instruments, one finds that they influence each other, as does involvement with different forms of music. As a musician, this allows a more colorful palette for expression and feeling. What You GetFor your $10 donation, you will receive a digital copy of the CD at completion. For your $20 donation, you will receive a signed CD by me by mail. The signed CD is offered on all upper tier perks as well.If our Funds goal is not met within our time frame, we will create an EP along with the already produced bonus track and send out a digital copy to each sponsor.  We will keep pushing for our fund goal and once that is met and we create the full album than we will also send you a digital copy of the full CD.  If you request a physical CD from me, I will send you one. This is only if we do not reach our goal Thank you so much in your support and Believing in us, we are so excited to get started and hear your feedback on how incredible the album sounds. ​

story:
The Way to Everest

Music is a passion I didn’t ask for, it came to me at my earliest memories. Forming itself in melodies and words, then as instrumental piano pieces and finally as finished formed songs. I spent years trying to get someone else to invest in my talent/art/music. I did countless tours across the country, recorded demo after demo, making changes as labels saw fit, made videos, took photos, did press and no matter how close my brushes to fame got, the dream never got realized. Instead, I was left with nothing to show for all the time, talent, and love I put into my craft. I wasted years, time, and money on chasing “the dream” and my music suffered. That’s when I decided to take things into my own hands, self-funding and releasing my own albums. Since then, I have been slowly teaching myself the ins and outs of how to make quality music with a quality product all under a lower-middle class wage. I work extra hours, save every dime, and cut corners everywhere I can, all putting every bit back into my music.The result of this labor of love are my two self-funded and self-released full-length records “Thin Skin and an Open Heart” and “Without Heroes”, and now the almost finished third album “Everest”. It is definitely my most ambitious and most challenging. I combined 80’s synth pop with 90’s garage rock to create something completely new for Pacifico. Like the two previous albums, Everest has been a collaborative effort. I wrote lyrics with the published poet Vincent Cellucci, worked with one of my mentors, Ronnie Martin (Joy Electric) for the analog synths, enlisted the insanely talented Trey Wadsworth for the album artwork, and constantly tried to push my own boundaries by surrounding myself with musicians and artists who inspire me, like Andrew Linton on the drums, C Jason Mask on guitar, and Ben White, Pacifico's original bass player for the bass.  And for the first time, I am hiring a PR agency to help get the songs heard. With a publicity group I will hopefully be able to have more interviews, reviews, write ups, plays, and ads for the album and the tour to follow (scroll all the way down to learn more about the tour). 

What We Need & What You Get

Pacifico is a collective and we want you to be a part of it! All the songs are recorded, and most of the songs are mixed, but we need your help for the finishing touches. Your money will go towards:

  • Mixing
  • Mastering
  • Album Artwork
  • Promotion

The biggest portion of your contributions will be needed for paying the PR agents to increase the chance of getting Everest heard by many. We have tried to select ways that you can help shape this album and get something pretty awesome in return. Apart from perks including digital and physical copies of Everest, we offer exciting things such as test pressings of the vinyl, a day-pass at a climbing gym thanks to an awesome collaboration with Uptown Climbing, tickets to shows, and a special-edition song book which is only available for the duration of this campaign. Our higher priced perks are where it gets really interesting: We offer private skype and in-person concerts, we'll cover any song of your choosing, or we will even produce one of your own songs for you!  No matter how much you choose to contribute, you will also receive an immediate download of an early mix of our single, so you can get excited for the rest of Everest to follow! 

You can see the many different perks to your right and hopefully you can find something that perfectly suits you. If you don’t see something you’d like please let us know, and we will try our best to make it happen for you. Your support really means to world to us!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some of you aren't able to contribute to our collective album as much as you might like. Believe us, we've been there. That doesn't mean that there aren't other ways you can support us! If you want to show your love, please get the word out about this campaign. You can use the share tools of Indiegogo to link this campaign to any of your social media platforms,  you can share our video, or you can just go old-school and tell your friends about it face-to-face. 

We're grateful to each and everyone of you and we cannot wait to show you what we've made together!!

 

 

Everest Tour

To fully give "Everest" the life it deserves we are setting off on our 1st tour since 2010. We will be hitting 34 cities in 34 days! You can even purchase a ticket to a concert near you with the perk to the right. Here are the dates (dates and cities are subject to change as they get finalized and confirmed):

story:
*English below*                                                   

             שלום לכולם :) 

אני מזמין אתכם להכנס לעולם המוזיקה שלי, שמשקף את עולמי הרגשי, חוויות שחוויתי, מחשבות, הרורים, רוח, תשוקה, תסכול, קושי, אהבה ועוד...

הכל נעשה בכנות מלאה והשירים נשמעים כמו שהלב שלי מרגיש,  וכמו ההשראה שנחתה עלי. בלי שום ניסיון למצוא חן או לרצות...
 

יש לכם הזדמנות להיות הראשונים שגורמים לחלום שלי לקרות. להיות חלק בלתי נפרד מהצעדים הראשונים שלי בעולם המוזיקה הלא פשוט.

בעזרת אנשים אהובים מאוד ארגנו פה תשורות שוות, מגוונות ומעניינות 

   שבעזרתם אצליח לממן את ההוצאות הרבות שכרוחות בהוצאת אלבום, כמו- שעות אולפן, מפיק, נגנים, מיקסינג, מסטרינג, הדפסה, גרפיקה ועוד.. יש הרבה אנשים שמשקיעים ימים ולילות כדי שהאלבום ישמע מעולה וכל הדברים הללו עולים לא מעט כסף.  

אני מודה מראש לכל מי שעוזר ותומך בפרוייקט בכל דרך שמתאפשרת לכם! 

אודה לכם אם תשתפו את המוזיקה שלי ואת הפרוייקט עם חברים ומשפחה ואנשים שהמוזיקה או התשורות יכולות לעניין אותם. 

תודה רבה רבה

באהבה, גיא

תשורות

אלבום דיגיטלי

 אלבום פיזי

כרטיסים להופעת השקת  האלבום

שיעורי יוגה

 ספר שירים עבודת יד עם הקדשה אישית ומילות השירים בכתב יד 

  עבודות אומנות בנושא השירים

סדנת מדיטציה

קורס לגידול דבורים ביו דינמי

סדנת ציור והדפסים

שיעור אימפרוביציה במפוחית

הופעה בייתית

קרדיט בדיסק

הופעת להקה

Hello everyone

I invite you to enter my music world that reflects my emotional experiences - thoughts, dreams, spiritual experiences, passions, frustrations, and more… Everythings is composed in a completely honest and genuine fashion, the songs show the way my heart feels, and like the many inspirations that have landed around my life, without any attempt to please anyone or any trend…

You have the opportunity to be some of the first to make my dream happen. To be an integral part of my first steps into the complicated world of music.

With the help of my very best friends and family, we organized a variety of interesting Perks that give you the option to help financially support expenses such as: studio hours, producer, musicians, mixing, mastering, printing, graphics and more.

There are several people who invest days and nights working endlessly on the album which in turn costs quite a lot.

I thank everyone who helps supports the project in any way possible!

Anything helps, even sharing my music and project with friends, family, or anyone who might be interested in my music, donating, or participating in some of the Perks offered throughout this project. Thank you very much!

digital album

Physical album

Album release concert

Yoga classes

Handmade lyrics books with personal thanks 

Artworks with the songs subjects

Meditation Workshop

Bio-dynamic beekeeping course

Painting and prints workshop 

improvisation harmonica lesson

Home concerts

Credit on album

Band concert

These are some of the perks you can choose to support me and be a significant part of the album itself
I thank you all from the buttom of my heart :) 

yours,

Guy

story:
About CRIMSON HIGHWAY and what we are doing.

 

OUR STORY

CRIMSON HIGHWAY is Chris Kelley (vocals), Bill Sargent (guitar), Mike Mancini (drums) & Tim Walsh (bass). This is THE band that all four of us have always wanted to be in, but were never able to work it out. In 2016 Mike, Bill & Tim started getting together to write some songs and it was magical. Never had any of us experienced playing in a band that everyone liked and heard the music that we were writing the same way. After we had written a handful of songs, it was obvious that we needed a singer/lyricist. As we sat down and wrote a long list of qualifications that we were looking for, it seemed like a nearly impossible task to find the perfect guy, but then Tim thought about his lifelong friend and he knew immediately that Chris filled every one of the items on our list, but there was one problem. Chris had decided a few years before to stop performing and just focus on writing songs and he was happy doing so.

Tim decided to give Chris a call anyway and convinced him to come out and check the songs out and although Chris was 100% sure that he had no interest and would not be joining us, he came out anyway as a favor to Tim. When he arrived, he was blown away by both the song writing and the chemistry. Once again, the magic was in the room and at an even higher level. It immediately felt like putting on your favorite pair of worn out jeans. It felt like family and home and we knew we had to share this music that we are so proud of with you and when we performed it live you gave us an overwhelmingly positive response. That brings us here, to 2017, we are CRIMSON HIGHWAY.

As is the case with all things in life: if something is worth doing, it's worth doing right! So, we spent a lot of time determining the best way to make our album. We knew that it was important to keep the magic and chemistry going in every element of this band so we knew that we had to have Ashley Peacock produce the album at Soul Foundry Studios, in Flint Michigan.

WHY FLINT, MI IS IMPORTANT TO US

It is extremely important to us to record in downtown Flint, as it is the city that we all call home. You see, Flint has a unique and beautiful heritage and even though it would seem to outsiders that only see the headlines that Flint is a tragic place to be due to everything from the closing of factories and the loss of jobs to the more recent Flint Water Crisis.

We know that Flint is also a beautiful place, with a heritage that spans many amazing historic accomplishments like being the birthplace of General Motors, the display of unity in the SIT-DOWN STRIKE, producing tanks for our armed forces during WWII. We also have the musical heritage of being the birthplace of one of the biggest Rock n Roll bands of their era, GRAND FUNK RAILROAD.

Decades later, the media paints a bleak picture of Flint, but what we have is the most resilient city in America. We are overcoming factory closures and job loss. Despite the current water crisis, Flint is still fighting as it is home to one of America's elite engineering schools, Kettering University. It is also home to a large University of Michigan campus along with Michigan State University, Baker College and Mott Community College. Flint is a city where art is starting to take a foothold and the city is once again beginning to embrace its artists.

So as Flint fights the odds and is discovering what it takes to have its revival, CRIMSON HIGHWAY is proud of our home and is committed to standing and fighting with our city.

 

DETAILS OF CRIMSON HIGHWAY'S PLANS (People & things that need to get paid)

THE STUDIO & RECORDING

   • Studio - The Soul Foundry

   • Producer - Ashley Peacock

   • Mastering - Grammy Award winner Richard Dodd

   • Studio Assistant & Engineering - Torri Lawrence

PACKAGING

   • Artwork - Alicia Music

   • Pressing CD's - WBD

   • Deluxe USB & Packaging – Factory Two

   • Release to all digital download & streaming services

Marketing & Promotion

   • Press Release

   • International Press Release

   • Advertising in industry publications

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE help us make some noise with our campaign. We are now dependent on you, that you enjoy our music enough to help us share it with the world. YOUR WORLD. Just like when you ask your friend if they have heard your latest favorite song and if not, you can’t wait to share it with them, please do that with CRIMSON HIGHWAY.
